This period of time between usages varied from five seconds to several minutes, depending upon the force of the repulsion or attraction that the Deva Path had used. When performing a large-scale attack, Nagato had to first sever his connections with the other paths and then employ his chakra only to the Deva Path for the attack. However this is considerably risky as the other Pains were healing considerably sluggishly when the Naraka Path administered his jutsu. The Deva Path`s Chibaku Tensei allowed it to release a black orb of energy that could attract all surrounding matter to form a huge makeshift terrestrial body. The Deva Path`s most infamous and one of his greatest feats was singlehandly wiping out Konohagakure with one powerful Shinra Tensei. In addition to gravity manipulation, Nagato was able to use a number of other miscellaneous jutsu through the Deva Path, something none of the other bodies had been shown doing. He was able to use the Shapeshifting Technique through the Deva path to make body doubles of others with human sacrifices. Other techniques used included astral projection, barriers to protect hideouts, and control rain, a possible throwback to Yahiko (who wanted to be able to stop the rain in Amegakure), which even allowed him to sense the chakra of everyone in Amegakure, making stealthy entrances by enemies impossible. In addition, like most of the other paths, it possessed considerable strength and speed, as seen with its fight with Jiraiya and Kakashi. As Pain`s main body, the Deva Path was the primary body used for performing the Sealing Technique: Illusionary Dragon Nine Consuming Seals, which Akatsuki used to seal the tailed beasts. The members would convene to forcibly extract the beast from its host`s body over a three day period, depending on the number of people assisting with the sealing, and would then store it in a giant statue. He was not the only one who could use this technique, however. Madara Uchiha and the remaining Akatsuki members have been shown to initiate the extraction without using the Deva Path while it was occupied with invading Konoha. Source: wiki

character.name: Konan
character.description: Konan is the only female ninja in http://anidb.net/ch8599 [Akatsuki]. As such, Kishimoto originally wanted her to have an obscene appearance showing more of her bust. Being a partner of http://anidb.net/ch12003 [Nagato], Konan was also a pupil under http://anidb.net/ch7213 [Jiraiya] after she was orphaned as a child by one of Amegakure`s many wars and forced to fend for herself. Because she serves under http://anidb.net/ch11993 [Pain], she is referred to by villagers of http://anidb.net/ch12202 [Amegakure] as "God`s angel". Though she worries for Nagato as he was straining himself from having his Pains battle http://anidb.net/ch226 [Naruto], she respects his wishes to stand aside so that he and Naruto might meet face to face. While under Jiraiya, Konan learned to take advantage of her natural talent with origami, using it as a key component in her battle style. Konan can divide her body into countless sheets of paper, which she controls and reshapes remotely to scout out an area, form weapons for attack, or create wings that mirror her title. However, Konan`s abilities are restricted when the paper is wet; since paper will cling to itself and lose its stiffness. After Nagato`s death, Konan withdraws her position in Akatsuki and leaves the organization, pledging the support of Amegakure to Naruto and http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konoha].

character.name: Manda
character.description: Manda was the personal summon of http://anidb.net/ch8603 [Orochimaru]; however, he was also summoned by http://anidb.net/ch7719 [Uchiha Sasuke]. Manda was very snobbish and prideful, believing himself as a superior to everyone. He apparently only served Orochimaru because he could not successfully defeat him, as http://anidb.net/ch8607 [Kabuto] expressed concern that Manda would turn on them if he knew Orochimaru couldn`t perform jutsu. Even in this instance, he complained about the conditions he was summoned into, and demanded that he be given a hundred human sacrifices as compensation for his help. When they lost this battle, Manda threatened Orochimaru to be prepared for a punishment during their next encounter. Manda had mutual animosity for http://anidb.net/ch12000 [Gamabunta].

character.name: Iwagakure no Sato
character.description: Hidden Stone Village (Iwagakure no Sato) is the hidden village of the Land of Earth. As one of the five great ninja villages, Iwagakure has a Kage as its leader known as the Tsuchikage. Its symbol is made of two rocks, with a smaller one in front of a larger one. The ninja from this village seem to specialize in Earth Release techniques. Iwagakure is well-known for the rock-hard attitude of its shinobi. As soon as the Tsuchikage gives an order, the Iwa-nin do so without hesitating, even if it means death. http://anidb.net/ch16171 [The Fourth Raikage] has also accused the current Tsuchikage, Oonoki, of having employed http://anidb.net/ch8599 [Akatsuki] in the past. The rocky mountain ranges that surround the village and country provide a natural stronghold. The village profits from this advantageous position and is proud of its strong defenses. The village sits among a mountain range consisting of small narrow waterfalls, with the buildings being composed of rock and stone; shaped from large, elevated formations of rock into tower-like structures. Many of its buildings sit on cliffs connected by a network of bridges. The Tsuchikage`s palace seems to be the tallest structure with a cone shaped roof. Iwagakure at one time had the Four-Tailed Monkey and the Five-Tailed Dolphin Horse, sealed in Roshi and Han respectively, in its possession. Both were eventually captured and extracted by Akatsuki. http://anidb.net/ch8597 [Deidara] was originally a shinobi of this village, but after he stole a kinjutsu to further his art, he defected and became a terrorist bomber for hire, and eventually was forced to join Akatsuki. The village was a participant in the Third Great Shinobi World War, invading Kusagakure and fighting against http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure]. The war went well for Iwagakure, almost reaching the border of the Land of Fire. However, despite their military power having hit an all-time low, Konohagakure managed to turn the tide of the war by destroying the Kannabi Bridge and so cutting off Iwagakure`s line of supply.

character.name: Takigakure no Sato
character.description: Village Hidden in a Waterfall (Takigakure no Sato) is located in an unnamed country. In terms of the village`s appearance, Takigakure seems to be based on mostly Southeast Asian aesthetics. Their current leader is Shibuki. The ninja of this village seem to specialize in water-based jutsu.

character.name: Kumogakure no Sato
character.description: Village Hidden in the Clouds (Kumogakure no Sato) is the Hidden Village of the Land of Lightning. As one of the five Great Ninja Villages, http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure] has a Kage as its leader, known as the http://anidb.net/ch16171 [Raikage]. The ninja from this village seem to specialize in Lightning Release techniques. A notable minority also seem to favor the use of Japanese-style swords (or katanas) as standard weapons, instead of the typical kunai that most shinobi wield; and, as a result, many Kumogakure ninjas seem to excel at swordsmanship. The village is located on a high mountain, and is literally hidden in the clouds. The Raikage lives in a large building built into the tallest mountain. Kumogakure, like http://anidb.net/ch12200 [Iwagakure] and http://anidb.net/ch12199 [Kirigakure], had two tailed beasts in its possession: the Two-Tailed Monster Cat in http://anidb.net/ch7721 [Nii Yugito], and the Eight-Tailed Giant Ox in http://anidb.net/ch13998 [Killer Bee]. What makes this village unique is the fact that the villagers were outraged when both Yugito and Killer Bee were captured by http://anidb.net/ch8599 [Akatsuki], as most villages had shunned their Jinchuuriki. Yugito and Killer Bee had a great deal of control over their tailed beasts, such that both were able to fully transform into their beasts. Due to the immense powers of releasing their beasts fully, despite retaining control of themselves, the Fourth Raikage forbade at least Killer Bee from doing so.

character.name: Yugakure no Sato
character.description: Village Hidden in Hot Water (Yugakure no Sato) is the village that the http://anidb.net/ch8599 [Akatsuki] member http://anidb.net/ch7740 [Hidan] originated from. Once a ninja village, Yugakure decided that it didn`t feel like staying a hidden village and transitioned out into a peaceful and prosperous village instead. However, Hidan, growing up, already showed a tendency toward violent Jashinist ways, decided that he didn`t like this and slaughtered his neighbors before leaving the village. Yugakure makes an appearance in the series in Shippuuden episode 92. When http://anidb.net/ch8607 [Yakushi Kabuto] and Yuukimaru are on a journey they stop here to rest. http://anidb.net/ch7714 [Yukimaru] meets http://anidb.net/ch226 [Uzumaki Naruto] in a hot spring and talks with him about how hearts can communicate. There wasn`t much seen from the village in the episode, but it seemed small and had no protective walls, like other ninja villages had.

character.name: Hanzou
character.description: Hanzou, also known as Hanzou of the Salamander (山椒魚の半蔵, Sanshouuo no Hanzou), was a legendary ninja who was the former leader of Amegakure. Hanzou became famous around the time of the Second Great Shinobi World War; when he fought some of Konoha`s forces, Jiraiya, Tsunade, and Orochimaru were the only ones to survive. As a reward to them for this accomplishment, he named them Konoha`s Sannin in exchange for letting them live. Years after his battle with the Sannin, when a group of ninja began a quest to end war through unorthodox means within his country, Hanzou viewed them as a threat to his power and sought to get rid of them. He teamed up with Konoha`s Root organization to kill the group`s leader, Yahiko. He lured Yahiko to a meeting where he forced Nagato, Yahiko`s teammate, to kill Yahiko in exchange for Konan`s life. However, Yahiko committed suicide by impaling himself upon Nagato`s kunai to spare his friend the anguish and burden of killing him himself. Nagato slaughtered Hanzou`s forces in retribution along with the shinobi of Root who had come to aid Hanzou. After a brief skirmish with Nagato, Hanzou fled the scene realizing that he could not deal with Nagato when he was so enraged and thus escaped. Nagato, under the alias of "Pain", would later begin a civil war within Amegakure. He single-handedly killed Hanzou, his family, and his retainers, and then conducted a systematic genocide of anybody even remotely associated with Hanzou, even to the extent of terminating the ambassadors of the villages Hanzou was associated with.

character.name: Gerotora
character.description: Gerotora is a scroll toad, a rare species that closely guards whatever secret has been written on its scroll-abdomen until his contractor dies. He resides in the belly of his contractor, and is known for his excellent endurance. Source: Narutopedia

character.name: Kurama
character.description: The nine-tailed demon fox (九尾の妖狐, Kyuubi no Youko) is the most powerful of the tailed beasts. It is regarded as an age-old natural disaster, as a single swipe of one of its tails can raise tsunamis and flatten mountains. Twelve years before the start of the series, the fox attacked http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure]. Its attack was stopped by the http://anidb.net/ch8866 [Fourth Hokage], who gave his life to seal the fox into his son, http://anidb.net/ch240 [Uzumaki Naruto]. Throughout the series, Naruto tries to gain dominance over the fox, as harnessing its great strength allows him to perform jutsu that would normally be impossible for a ninja of his age. At the same time the fox tries to gain control over Naruto, provoking his rage and thus allowing its violent personality to influence and consume him. As Naruto draws upon more of the fox`s power the seal keeping it trapped within him weakens, and in the event the seal is broken the fox will be released. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Killer Bee
character.description: Killer Bee is a ninja from the village of Kumogakure. He is introduced during Part II as one of the two hosts that have yet to be captured by the criminal organization Akatsuki, the other being series protagonist http://anidb.net/ch226 [Uzumaki Naruto]. The host of the ushi-oni-like http://anidb.net/ch14124 [eight-tailed beast], Killer Bee has complete control over the beast sealed within him. In battle he uses its great strength to increase the lethality of his professional wrestling-styled attacks. He is also a talented swordsman capable of using up to seven swords at once. Killer Bee is the brother of http://anidb.net/ch16171 [Aa], the current Raikage of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure], and as such is expected to be the guardian of the village. When Akatsuki attacks him, he pretends to be captured to escape this job and pursue a career as an enka music singer.

character.name: Shiranami
character.description: Leader of the Magaki Group.

character.name: Aa
character.description: Aa is the Fourth Raikage and the leader of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure]. He is also the older brother of http://anidb.net/ch13998 [Killer Bee], the jinchuuriki of the Eight-Tailed Giant Ox. As it is hinted that Killer Bee is a member of the Yotsuki clan, A is likely a member, as well. Knowing http://anidb.net/ch7721 [Nii Yugito]`s and Killer Bee`s immense powers if they were to ever transform into their full demon forms, he forbade at least Killer Bee from doing so.

character.name: Morino Ibiki
character.description: Morino Ibiki is a http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konoha] Special Jounin and was the examiner for the first part of the Chuunin Exams. He is also the head of Konoha`s ANBU Torture and Interrogation Force.

character.name: Jay
character.description: Jay was a shinobi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure]. Jay is a bald man with a Flak Jacket with one strap over one shoulder, and a black shirt underneath. He also wear a sports sunglasses and a Forehead Protector with a white cloth. Jay and his partner discovered that http://anidb.net/ch13998 [Killer Bee] was fighting members of http://anidb.net/ch8599 [Akatsuki] while transformed into the Eight-Tailed Beast. He sent words of his discovery to the http://anidb.net/ch16171 [Fourth Raikage] and then used his messenger lizard to follow Killer Bee`s opponents. He was later discovered by http://anidb.net/ch7719 [Uchiha Sasuke] and http://anidb.net/ch9656 [Juugo] before being captured. Jay was later found slumped against the wall of the hideout by other Kumogakure shinobi, but his condition is unknown.

character.name: Omoi
character.description: Omoi is a shinobi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure], and a member of Team Samui. He is http://anidb.net/ch13998 [Killer Bee]`s student along with the other two members of his team. He is a young, dark-skinned Kumo-nin with short, spiky, white hair. He is always seen sucking on a lollipop. As a sword user he carries his sword on his back with the one strapped Kumo Flack Jacket. He has amazing speed, and is able to move around the battlefield in the blink of an eye. His taijutsu skill is good, being able to move around fluidly with his teammates. He also uses swordplay in his fighting style, like many Kumogakure shinobi.

character.name: Karui
character.description: Karui is a kunoichi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure], and a member of Team Samui. The team was sent to http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konoha] by the http://anidb.net/ch16171 [Fourth Raikage] to inform them that they would be taking care of http://anidb.net/ch7719 [Uchiha Sasuke] and http://anidb.net/ch8599 [Akatsuki]. She, along with the other two members of her team, are http://anidb.net/ch13998 [Killer Bee]`s students. She seems to have a somewhat comedic-negative relationship with her teammate, http://anidb.net/ch16825 [Omoi]. During their debut, they argued over the possible reasons that they could have been called by the Raikage. She assumed that he wanted them to get him more protein shakes. However, the argument started with Omoi implying that she is flat-chested in comparison to their teammate, Samui. However, like the rest of her team, she highly respects Killer Bee. She is also quite outspoken and allows her emotions to let out, as she angrily yelled at Team Kakashi to allow the renegade Sasuke to run loose. She came to a violent point when she took out her rage on http://anidb.net/ch226 [Naruto] and beat him.

character.name: Samui
character.description: Samui is a kunoichi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure], and the leader of Team Samui. She has short blond hair just around her chin, she wears a revealing skirt with a shirt, and has a body comparable to that of http://anidb.net/ch8606 [Tsunade], since she has fair skin, blond hair, large breasts, and appears very seductive. As opposed to her two talkative teammates, Samui is mature, calm, and generally silent, only speaking when needed.

character.name: Mabui
character.description: The http://anidb.net/ch16171 [Fourth Raikage]`s assistant acts as a go-between for the Raikage and http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure]`s forces, giving them his orders and keeping him updated on their progress. She`s a dark-skinned girl who is seen wearing a very formal attire during work hours, long earrings, and properly pulling her hair back into a bun except for the frontal part of it, which consists of two flat side bangs that fall along the sides of her face. She remains calm in stressful situations and immediately completes the tasks she is given. Furthermore, she, like Darui, appears to be quite annoyed every time the Raikage bursts through walls whenever the use of doors is required, and even suggests that he`s broken through his office windows on more than one occasion.

character.name: Taiseki
character.description: Taiseki was a shinobi from http://anidb.net/ch12200 [Iwagakure] who fought and died during the Third Great Shinobi World War. He formed a team with Kakkou, using their superb diversionary tactics to attack the enemy. With his Hiding with Camouflage Technique he was able to approach his enemies from their blind spot, easily killing them with a single strike. He confronted Team Minato, led by http://anidb.net/ch7248 [Hatake Kakashi], during the Third Great Shinobi World War, managing to take http://anidb.net/ch10927 [Rin] captive. He was later killed by http://anidb.net/ch10928 [Uchiha Obito], however, while he and Kakashi attempted to rescue Rin. Taiseki also injured Kakashi`s eye, leading to him gaining his Sharingan from Obito.

character.name: Kamizuki Izumo
character.description: Kamizuki Izumo is a Chuunin from http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure]. He spends most of the time with his partner, http://anidb.net/ch10329 [Hagane Kotetsu]. Izumo is almost always seen alongside Kotetsu, and is characterized as being the more responsible and conscientious of the two. In Shippuuden Episode 81, he angrily burst into the Jounin lounge to drag his partner back to work. Similarly, in another omake, he admonished Kotetsu`s lack of pride in his work when the latter complained that they were simply the http://anidb.net/ch8606 [Fifth Hokage]`s errand-boys or "gophers", before adding sagely that guarding the Leaf and the villagers was "the best mission you can get" as a shinobi.

character.name: Tonton
character.description: Tonton is http://anidb.net/ch8606 [Tsunade]`s pet pig, often kept in the care of http://anidb.net/ch8613 [Shizune]. She does not speak in any human language, but still manages to get her point across by whining in her own unique tone (a "buhi" or "oink" depending on the language). It seems that Tsunade and Shizune are able to understand what Tonton is trying to say. Tonton`s nose also seems adept at tracking things, such so that http://anidb.net/ch10966 [Pakkun] has some familiarity with her.

character.name: Shimura Danzou
character.description: Shimura Danzou is one of the oldest villagers in http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure], a war hawk who believes that all of the former Hokage have placed peace above the village`s best interests. He was one of the elders who orchestrated the Uchiha Clan`s demise. The right half of his body is covered in bandages to hide a damaged Sharingan eye transplanted from the body of Uchiha Shisui, as well as the vast amount of Sharingan eyes grafted to his arm. He also had himself injected with the cells of the http://anidb.net/ch8859 [First Hokage] allowing him to use the Senju Clan`s unique skills. He was once considered for the position of Third Hokage, but that title was given to http://anidb.net/ch8865 [Hiruzen Sarutobi] whom he served as an adviser. Since then he has been using The Foundation, his own personal black ops team, to secretly ensure he would become Hokage. Throughout Part II, Danzo has been at odds with http://anidb.net/ch8606 [Tsunade] and acts on his agenda of killing off http://anidb.net/ch7719 [Sasuke] in secret. But after Konohagakure is destroyed, Danzo finally convinces the Fire Country`s feudal lord to make him Acting Candidate Sixth Hokage, using his new found power to have the ninja track down both Sasuke and http://anidb.net/ch8607 [Kabuto], the latter in order to restore Shisui`s eye. However, while at the Kage conference, Danzou is forced into fighting Sasuke. He dies shortly after Sasuke mortally wounds him with his lightning technique.

character.name: Utatane Koharu
character.description: Utatane Koharu is a former member of Team Tobirama, together with http://anidb.net/ch8865 [Sarutobi Hiruzen] and http://anidb.net/ch17202 [Mitokado Homura]. Homura and her now form the Konoha Council. Under the guidance of the Second Hokage, http://anidb.net/ch8862 [Senju Tobirama], Koharu and her teammates, Hiruzen and Homura, completed numerous missions and became close friends. When Hiruzen became the Third Hokage, Homura and Koharu became his councilors. With their years of experience and knowledge and their unending effort to make http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure] a better place, they eventually gained similar respect and social status as the Hokage himself.

character.name: Mitokado Homura
character.description: Mitokado Homura is a former member of Team Tobirama, together with http://anidb.net/ch8865 [Sarutobi Hiruzen] and http://anidb.net/ch17201 [Utatane Koharu]. He and Koharu now form the Konoha Council. He is a target for http://anidb.net/ch7719 [Uchiha Sasuke]`s assassination. Ever since their childhood, Homura and Hiruzen Sarutobi have been close friends. Under the guidance of the Second Hokage, http://anidb.net/ch8862 [Senju Tobirama], they and their third teammate, Koharu Utatane, have completed numerous missions together. When Hiruzen became the Third Hokage, Homura and Koharu became his councilors. With their years of experience and knowledge and their unending effort to make Konohagakure a better place, they eventually gained similar respect and social status as the Hokage himself. Thanks to his prudence and efficiency, Homura especially has gained the absolute faith of the Konoha shinobi.

character.name: Katsuyu
character.description: Katsuyu is the slug queen summoned by http://anidb.net/ch8606 [Tsunade]. The name Katsuyu apparently comes from Slug (蛞蝓) in on`yomi. Compared to http://anidb.net/ch12000 [Gamabunta] and Manda, the summons of http://anidb.net/ch7213 [Jiraiya] and http://anidb.net/ch8603 [Orochimaru] respectively, Katsuyu is quiet and more subservient to her master. She addresses Tsunade with the highly respectful honorific "-sama", and, in the English versions, calls her Mistress or Milady. Katsuyu tends to also use honorifics like "-kun" and "-san" on other villagers. http://anidb.net/ch7698 [Sakura] and http://anidb.net/ch8613 [Shizune] show her considerable respect, addressing her as "Katsuyu-sama". In the English dub, she is referred to as "Lady Katsuyu".

character.name: Akimichi Chouza
character.description: Akimichi Chouza is the father of http://anidb.net/ch8617 [Akimichi Chouji] and former teammate of Nara Shikaku and http://anidb.net/ch10962 [Yamanaka Inoichi]. Together they were the previous Ino-Shika-Cho trio. The kanji on his chest armor means "food". Chouza is the head of the Akimichi clan, and was part of the first "Ino-Shika-Cho Trio" alongside Nara Shikaku and Yamanaka Inoichi, his name being the Cho part of the group name. He is a seemingly gentle and caring man with great wisdom and understanding of the world, and has deep love for his son, Chouji. Like the rest of his clan, he has a large appetite, and is prone to eat everything on an entire page on the menu. He seems very keen to fight with his teammates, and shares a very strong friendship.

character.name: Hatake Sakumo
character.description: Hatake Sakumo, also known as Konoha`s White Fang, is the father of http://anidb.net/ch7248 [Hatake Kakashi]. Sakumo was a famous and powerful ninja of Konohagakure who, during his life, was greater than even the Sannin. His son, Kakashi, idolized him and sought to become just as great a ninja as his father; his wife had died when Kakashi was very young. Sometime in a war, Sakumo also killed http://anidb.net/ch7741 [Sasori]`s parents, earning http://anidb.net/ch9650 [Chiyo]`s hatred. Five years before the events of the Kakashi Gaiden, Sakumo and his team were sent on a mission of great importance to Konoha. When his teammates` lives were endangered, Sakumo chose to abandon the mission in order to save them. He was disgraced when he returned home, shunned by everyone in the village, even those he had saved. Dishonored, Sakumo fell into a deep depression, as well as a drop in his skills. Eventually, he committed suicide, which caused Kakashi to live strictly according to the Ninja Code during the time before his last mission with http://anidb.net/ch10928 [Uchiha Obito]. Taken from Narutopedia

character.name: Tobitake Tonbo
character.description: Tobitake Tonbo is a http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure] Chuunin. Most of his face is wrapped in bandages, and he usually has a cigarette in his mouth. Tonbo made his first appearance during the written section of the Chuunin Exams as one of the various shinobi looking out for cheaters. When he caught Komaza cheating five times, Tonbo knocked Komaza into a wall. In the anime, Tonbo and Tatami Iwashi alerted http://anidb.net/ch8606 [Tsunade] about Mizuki and the Legendary Stupid Brothers having escaped prison together. Tonbo, along with http://anidb.net/ch17691 [Hijiri Shimon] and http://anidb.net/ch17692 [Mozuku], facilitated in http://anidb.net/ch10962 [Yamanaka Inoichi]`s Mind Reading of http://anidb.net/ch17695 [Yuudachi]. He complimented the speed at which Inoichi could read his memories, although Mozuku harshly scolded him for not concentrating on probing Yuudachi. When the invasion of Pain starts, they help distract the Animal Path to give Inoichi a chance to analyze what he has learned.

character.name: Hijiri Shimon
character.description: Hijiri Shimon is a Chuunin from Konohagakure. He is a proctor for the written portion of the Chuunin Exams. In Part II, He, Mozuku, and Tobitake Tonbo assist Yamanaka Inoichi in reading the mind of Yuudachi. When the invasion of Pain starts, they help distract the Animal Path to give Inoichi a chance to analyse what he has learned.

character.name: Mozuku
character.description: Mozuku is a Chuunin from http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure]. He acts as one of the proctors during the written portion of the Chuunin Exams, watching out for signs of cheating. He later fetches http://anidb.net/ch10929 [Mitarashi Anko] when Team Shiore is found dead. In the anime, he, Anko and Iwashi are seen on a mission shortly before Anko senses http://anidb.net/ch8603 [Orochimaru]`s death. Mozuku, along with http://anidb.net/ch17690 [Tobitake Tonbo] and http://anidb.net/ch17691 [Hijiri Shimon], facilitate in http://anidb.net/ch10962 [Yamanaka Inoichi]`s Mind Reading of http://anidb.net/ch17695 [Yuudachi]. When the invasion of Pain starts, they help distract the http://anidb.net/ch17693 [Animal Path] to give Inoichi a chance to analyse what he has learned.

character.name: Pain (Chikushoudou)
character.description: Pain (Animal Path) was the second of Nagato`s Six Paths of Pain to be shown. It is the only path shown to have existed as two different bodies. The first Animal Path was captured by Jiraiya and sent to Konoha for study. It was replaced with a female body and the original was later recovered and destroyed by the Preta Path during the invasion of Pain. The second Animal Path was later incapacitated by Naruto`s Sage Technique: Rasenrengan.

character.name: Ryuusui
character.description: Ryuusui is a genin from http://anidb.net/ch12202 [Amegakure], though he has a scratch through the village symbol on his headband to indicate his loyalty to http://anidb.net/ch11993 [Pain]. He and his partner, http://anidb.net/ch17695 [Yuudachi], are captured by http://anidb.net/ch7213 [Jiraiya]. When they refused to tell Jiraiya any information on Pain, even after tickle torture on his partner, he transformed Yuudachi into a frog, which frightened Ryuusui into divulging information about Pain. Jiraiya then tries to control Ryuusui in an attempt to find Pain, but is found by http://anidb.net/ch11994 [Konan]. Ryuusui then follows Konan`s orders to leave and is able to escape.

character.name: Yuudachi
character.description: Yuudachi is a genin from http://anidb.net/ch12202 [Amegakure], though he has a scratch through the village symbol on his headband to indicate his loyalty to http://anidb.net/ch11993 [Pain]. He and his partner, http://anidb.net/ch17694 [Ryuusui], are captured by http://anidb.net/ch7213 [Jiraiya]. When they refused to tell Jiraiya any information on Pain, he uses a feather to tickle-torture Yuudachi into giving him the info. When this failed, Jiraiya transformed Yuudachi into a frog, which cowed Ryuusui into divulging info about Pain. Jiraiya sends Yuudachi to Konoha, where he is interrogated by http://anidb.net/ch16789 [Ibiki]. When Ibiki can`t learn anything from him, http://anidb.net/ch10962 [Inoichi] probes his mind and, after passing through many barricades that were placed in Yuudachi to prevent probing, discovers that Yuudachi used to bring dead bodies to http://anidb.net/ch11994 [Konan], not knowing what they were being used for. He is apparently killed by the Animal Path during the invasion of Pain, although it is possible that he was revived along with everyone else Pain had killed during invasion.

character.name: Pain (Gakidou)
character.description: Pain (Preta Path) was the third of Nagato`s Six Paths of Pain to be shown. It was incapacitated during the invasion of Pain after it absorbed too much of Naruto Uzumaki`s senjutsu chakra and turned into a toad statue. When it was alive, the Preta Path belonged to a large, bulky man from Kusagakure. The anime showed that he was both a ninja and a farmer who`d failed to cultivate the land for his family due to his participation in the Third Great Shinobi World War. The Preta Path, like all of the six paths, possessed Nagato`s Rinnegan. It had orange hair tied in a short ponytail. It had small spike piercings covering its entire bottom lip, two vertical spike studs on the front of his nose, two spike studs (one on each cheek), a metal bar going through each ear, and a stud on his shoulder, one on each side, close to his neck. This path`s "Energy Absorption" ability was primarily defensive, since it was capable of absorbing any ninjutsu-related technique, thereby nullifying its effect. This technique could also take the form of a barrier around its body, allowing it to absorb attacks from all directions. In addition to its defensive properties, this body`s ability had also shown offensive capabilities, as it could absorb all the chakra out of any person that it touched or grabbed.

character.name: Pain (Ningendou)
character.description: Pain (Human Path) was the fourth of Nagato`s Six Paths of Pain to be shown. It was destroyed during the Invasion of Pain after it was struck by Naruto Uzumaki`s Wind Release: Rasenshuriken. When it was alive, the Human Path belonged to a tall, slender man from Takigakure. In the anime, he was shown to have been a level-headed ninja who believed that all he could do to try and achieve peace and to teach the next generation to survive the battles with other ninja until it came. The Human Path, like all of the six paths, possessed Nagato`s Rinnegan. It had long, loose orange hair, which was a light gray-blue colour while it was alive. It had multiple piercings, including a diagonal bar though its nose, two circular studs in a vertical row on each of its cheeks, two studs placed horizontally on its chin, and a stud on each of its shoulders near its neck. The diagonal nose piercing makes it the only Pain with asymmetrical facial piercings. During Pain`s battle with Jiraiya, the Human Path`s eyes were damaged and it was left unable to see. For this reason, it used only taijutsu during the battle. The Human Path was later shown to have the capability of mind reading simply by placing its hand over the target`s head, and could extort any information or secret being hidden by the victim against his/her will. The most powerful and lethal ability possessed by the Human Path was its power to remove its target`s soul by ripping it out of his/her body, thus killing the victim. Despite its lethal ability, Nagato deemed the Human Path less important than Animal Path, as he sacrificed it to get the Animal Path out of Naruto`s Wind Release: Rasenshuriken`s radius, having the path ripped to bits.

character.name: Pain (Shuradou)
character.description: Pain (Asura Path) was the fifth of Nagato`s Six Paths of Pain to be shown. It was destroyed twice during the invasion of Pain, first by Kakashi`s Lightning Cutter and then for a second time by Naruto`s Rasengan. When it was alive, the Asura Path belonged to a tall, bald man with an unusual body shape, possessing a very thick neck, no ears and a large jaw. In the anime, the Asura Path was shown to be a wandering puppeteer with insight to the world. He also had part of his face obscured by a rice hat in the anime, possibly hiding a headband that had not been shown in the manga, as Jiraiya quickly discovered that he was a ninja. The Asura Path`s unnamed puppet was made to look like a baby, and was capable of emitting infantile cries. The Asura Path, like all of the six paths, possessed Nagato`s Rinnegan. It was the only body to not have orange hair, simply because it had no hair at all. It had a vertical ring piercing on its nose, six spike studs all around its head, three studs on the top and bottom of each of its six arms, an enormous cylindrical stud on its chin, and two vertical studs on each of its upper cheeks. The body had three faces, each with a different expression, and two of which appeared from the sides of its head only when it removed its cloak in a fight: happy (its normal face), angry, and neutral. This body was very different from all other paths, being more like an android, as it had a number of body alterations. It was shown to have robotic inner workings, possessing six arms and a folded, serrated blade-like tail. It could fire one of its left forearms off as a long-range projectile, and could pull out his arms to reveal and fire a cluster of segmented missiles at its targets. It could quickly propel itself forward with a burst of chakra from its boots, and could protract multiple blades and a drill from one of its arms in battle. Also, it could open up the crown of its head to release a titanic shockwave that was capable of destroying numerous buildings at once. Its physical raw power was enough to rip Jiraiya`s arm off, and then crush his throat with basic Taijutsu moves, as well as to throw Animal Path all the way into Konohagakure from the forests in its outskirts. All of these abilities befitted the "warring demon" name that the Asura Path held, whilst giving it a considerably higher degree of versatility than the other paths had (aside from the Deva Path). Despite being used frequently and providing heavy firepower, the Asura Path was readily sacrificed to protect the even more powerful Deva Path, acting as a human shield against Kakashi`s Lightning Cutter.

character.name: Pain (Jigokudou)
character.description: Pain (Naraka Path) was the sixth of Nagato`s Six Paths of Pain to be shown. It was incapacitated during the invasion of Pain by Naruto Uzumaki`s Sage Technique: Rasenrengan. When it was alive, the Naraka Path belonged to a tall, stocky, muscular man. The anime showed him to be somewhat of a holy man in a small village, strongly emphasizing the power of prayer among his religious disciples. The Naraka Path, like all of the six paths, possessed Nagato`s Rinnegan. It had a spiky mop of orange hair, which had been a gray-brown color while he was alive. It had multiple body piercings, such as a circular stud on the bridge of its nose, a diagonal row of studs on each of its cheeks, three spike piercings in each of its ears, and a stud on each of its shoulders near its neck. Although it was physically strong enough to lift a man with one hand, the only ability exhibited by the Naraka Path lay in the use of summoning the Outer Path. The Outer Path is a large head which sprouts out of the ground surrounded by purple flames and possesses the Rinnegan. The Outer Path could fulfill two purposes: interrogation and restoration. To interrogate, the Naraka Path need only catch hold of a person, causing the Outer Path to appear before them. With the victim seemingly paralyzed, the Naraka Path begins questioning them. After answers are given, the King of Hell will unzip its mouth to release tendril-like arms and would draw out the victim`s tongue. The Outer Path then proceeds to pass its judgment. If the person was lying or refused to answer the questions, the Outer Path would remove their tongue and consume it, apparently killing them. However, if they told the truth, they would be spared, although left extremely exhausted. The second ability the Naraka Path possessed is the ability to repair any damage. To do so the Naraka Path has the Outer Path ingest the damaged body with its tendril-like arms into its mouth. Then, after some time, the destroyed body will emerge from its mouth, completely healed and rejuvenated. In all situations where Pain`s bodies were shown in a combat formation, the Naraka Path always took a rear position with the others protecting it, behind even the Deva Path. This indicates that the Naraka Path`s healing ability made it one of Pain`s most important bodies.

character.name: Rokubi no Namekuji
character.description: The Six-Tailed Slug (六尾の蛞蝓, Rokubi no Namekuji) is a tailed beast sealed within http://anidb.net/ch14668 [Utakata] of Kirigakure. It has been captured by http://anidb.net/ch12003 [Nagato] in the anime, then extracted and sealed by http://anidb.net/ch8599 [Akatsuki]. [Taken from Narutowikia]

character.name: Yahiko
character.description: Yahiko was a shinobi from Amegakure. His body acted as the http://anidb.net/ch11993 [Deva Path] of http://anidb.net/ch12003 [Nagato`s] Six Paths of Pain.

character.name: Tazuna
character.description: Tazuna is a master bridge-builder, the father of Tsunami, and the grandfather of Inari.

character.name: Inari
character.description: Inari is the son of Tsunami, the grandson of Tazuna, and was the adopted son of Kaiza before his death.

character.name: Condor
character.description: Condor, known as Mr. Ostrich in his debut, is an ostrich that Team 7 had to return to his home. Sometime after he returned home, he escaped again and trained himself in becoming a ninja ostrich and learning to speak. Since then, he considered Naruto Uzumaki his rival who prevented his freedom.

character.name: Hyuuga Hiashi
character.description: Hyuuga Hiashi is the head of the Hyuuga clan. He is also the father of Hyuuga Hinata and Hyuuga Hanabi, as well as the older twin brother of the late Hyuuga Hizashi, and the paternal uncle of Hyuuga Neji.

character.name: Terumi Mei
character.description: Terumi Mei is the Fifth Mizukage of Kirigakure. She became Mizukage in recent years, after the dreadful reign of Yagura ended.

character.name: Fuu
character.description: Fuu was a ninja of Konohagakure, a member of the Yamanaka clan and a high-ranking member of Root.

character.name: Torune
character.description: Torune was a ninja of Konohagakure, a member of the Aburame clan, and a high-ranking member of the Root.

character.name: Akatsuchi
character.description: Akatsuchi is an Iwagakure shinobi and was one of the bodyguards of the Third Tsuchikage during the Five Kage Summit.

character.name: Ao
character.description: Ao is a shinobi of Kirigakure and skilled enough to be a member of his country`s ANBU Hunter-nin squad.

character.name: C
character.description: C is a jounin-level ninja of Kumogakure.

character.name: Chourou
character.description: He is a highly respected elder in Kirigakure.

character.name: Choujurou
character.description: Choujurou is a member of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist and wields the twin sword: Hiramekarei.

character.name: Darui
character.description: Darui is a jounin-level shinobi from Kumogakure. He is also the Commander of the First Division of the Allied Shinobi Forces.

character.name: Kurotsuchi
character.description: Kurotsuchi is a kunoichi from Iwagakure and is the granddaughter of the Third Tsuchikage. She is also part of the Second Division of the Allied Shinobi Forces, along with her father.

character.name: Mifune
character.description: Mifune is the general of the Land of Iron, where the Kage Summit took place. He later joins the Allied Shinobi Forces where he is assigned to be General of the Fifth Division.

character.name: Okisuke
character.description: Okisuke is a samurai who alongside Urakaku, assists Mifune during the Kage Summit.

character.name: Oonoki
character.description: Oonoki is the Third Tsuchikage of Iwagakure. He is called Oonoki of Both Scales.

character.name: Urakaku
character.description: Urakaku is a samurai who along with Okisuke, assists Mifune during the Kage meeting.

character.name: Hi no Kuni Daimyou
character.description: The current daimyou of the Land of Fire is the leader of the country, and husband of Madam Shijimi.

character.name: Sabu
character.description: Sabu is an enka ninja music master. He apparently has a large raccoon named Ponta, as a pet. Killer Bee calls him Sabu-chan and later the oddly constructed Master Sabu-chan. In the anime, Sabu`s name was changed to Kin for unknown reasons

character.name: Ponta
character.description: Ponta is a raccoon and the companion of the master enka music ninja, Sabu.

character.name: Rikudou Sennin
character.description: Rikudou Sennin was the legendary figure who founded the arts of ninjutsu and created the ninja world. He defeated the Ten-Tailed Beast and sealed it within his own body, thus becoming the first jinchuuriki.

character.name: Akimichi Torifu
character.description: Torifu Akimichi is a Konoha shinobi.

character.name: Uchiha Kagami
character.description: Kagami Uchiha was a shinobi from Konohagakure`s Uchiha clan.

character.name: Mizuki
character.description: Mizuki is a shinobi of Konohagakure and a former fellow Ninja Academy instructor alongside Iruka Umino. He later becomes the first antagonist of the series.

character.name: Muu
character.description: Muu is the Second Tsuchikage. His body is covered by intricately wrapped bandages, with only his eyes and nose visible, giving him an overall mummy-like appearance. These features are accentuated by a dark-coloured headband with no distinguishing markings and dark pants. Muu is an extremely calm and collected individual, and unfailingly polite. He is also a skilled sensor type shinobi displaying the ability to sense chakra over a distance of several kilometers. Furthermore, when these detection capabilities are employed in conjunction with his quick reflexes, he can avoid techniques that even other Kage`s find difficult to evade. He has also demonstrated the ability to levitate and fly. Muu is capable of becoming perfectly camouflaged with the surrounding environment. His camouflage is so good that he has become renowned as the "Non-Person" (Mujin), a title which he gained for seemingly having no form, and no chakra, while the technique was active. It is impossible to detect him by normal means. Muu is one of the few people capable of using a kekkei touta, an advanced and extremely powerful form of kekkei genkai. In particular, he possesses the Dust Release, which allows him to combine the fire, the earth and the wind element to reduce his opponents to nothing more than mere dust, destroying them down to even a molecular level. This Dust Release makes him so powerful that the Allied Shinobi Forces fear him greatly. He also had a great enmity with the Second Mizukage. The two men eventually killed each other in battle.

character.name: Uzumaki Mito
character.description: She was the first jinchuuriki of the Kyuubi.

character.name: Motoi
character.description: Motoi is a Kumogakure shinobi who is stationed on the Island Turtle.

character.name: Sandaime Raikage
character.description: The father of Aa.

character.name: Atsui
character.description: Atsui is the brother of http://anidb.net/ch16827 [Samui], a shinobi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure] and part of the First Division of the Shinobi Allied Forces led by http://anidb.net/ch29709 [Darui]. Contrary to his sister, Atsui is a hot-headed and spirited man, preffering to attack his enemies head-on. He has shoulder-length, blond hair and green eyes. His typical attire consists of a sleeveless version of the standard Kumogakure uniform, along with the village`s respective flak jacket and the kanji for "heat" (熱, netsu) tattooed on his left shoulder. Source: Narutopedia

character.name: Otsutsuki Hagoromo
character.description: Hagoromo Otsutsuki, also known to the world at large as the Rikudou Sennin (Sage of Six Paths) was the legendary figure who founded Ninshuu, which led to the creation of the ninja world. Together with his fraternal twin brother, Hamura, he defeated the Ten-Tailed Beast and sealed it within his own body, thus becoming the first jinchuuriki.

character.name: Hinoko
character.description: is a Konohagakure Anbu. She strongly prefers to go by her codename: Soku (鏃, Soku).

character.name: Ro

character.name: Minoichi

character.name: Aoda

character.name: Sansho

character.name: Sadoru

character.name: Momo

character.name: Youhouka
character.description: This individual known around Sora-ku only as the Beekeeper is one of the few suppliers of mead. Due to the swarm of bees surrounding their body, the Bee-themed Anbu mask they wear, and their androgynous voice, their gender is unknown.

character.description: renowned as The Wandering Miko (歩きの巫女, Aruki no Miko, Viz: The Wandering Nun), was an Anbu from Konohagakure`s Root division. She left the organisation and became a jōnin in the regular forces, a captain of the Medic Corps, and a caretaker at the village`s orphanage. At the orphanage she became known as "Mother" (マザー, Mazā). While undercover in Iwagakure, she went by the name "Nanigashi" (ナニガシ, Nanigashi).

character.name: Amai
character.description: On a mission with the Fourth Raikage and his comrades, Karai was incapacitated and taken back to Amai for treatment. Though his group had successfully acquired the scroll, he was unable to treat Karai. While in town, he saw Tsunade and reported this to the Raikage. Though Karai objected to this, the Raikage noted that he would have Tsunade heal him. When they approached Tsunade, Amai beseeched Tsunade to heal his comrade despite her refusal due to the bad blood between the two nations. He would later aid Shizune during the procedure to remove the Exploding Insect from his chest cavity.

character.name: Karai
character.description: While returning from a covert mission in the Sugi Village having stolen their kinjutsu Karai, Nigai and the Fourth Raikage are set upon by the mercenary Nokizaru Group who had been hired to retrieve the scroll. Though they fled, an Exploding Insect was implanted into them microscopically and after they berated the Raikage, an irate Nigai attacked the group only to explode. Following the same vein, Karai attacked them but stopped before he could be killed. Later, Amai, another comrade and medical-nin attempted to heal him but to no avail. Eventually, despite his initial protest, Tsunade was sought out to heal him, and the insect was removed by Shizune while Amai helped conduct the surgery.

character.name: Nigai
character.description: While on a covert mission to steal a kinjutsu from the Sugi Village, he, A, and Karai were set upon by the mercenary Nokizaru Group who had been hired to retrieve the scroll. Though initially telling his comrades to ignore the taunts of the group, he falls prey to it when they chide the Raikage for running away. Turning to face his opponents he uses a technique and immediately swelled to giant proportions and then exploded.

character.description: is a shinobi from Kumogakure, and the Captain (班長, hanchō) of the Kumo Barrier Team.

character.description: is a kunoichi from Konohagakure. She is also a member of the Allied Mothers Force.

character.name: Haruno Kizashi
character.description: In the anime, after learning that his daughter was to be taught by Kakashi Hatake, Kizashi and his wife were visited by Kakashi and the Third Hokage. Kizashi and his wife eagerly invited both of them for tea.

character.name: Rashii
character.description: is a jōnin from Kumogakure.

character.name: A
character.description: was the Second Raikage (二代目雷影, Nidaime Raikage, Literally meaning: Second Lightning Shadow) of Kumogakure. Throughout his reign he worked hard towards building peace between the other hidden villages.

character.name: Ginkaku
character.description: was one of Kumogakure`s Gold and Silver Brothers alongside Kinkaku, who were the most notorious criminals in the history of their village.

character.name: Kinkaku
character.description: was one of Kumogakure`s infamous Gold and Silver Brothers, and a member of the Kinkaku Force.

character.name: Hoozuki Gengetsu
character.description: was the Second Mizukage (二代目水影, Nidaime Mizukage, Literally meaning: Second Water Shadow) of Kirigakure. He was also a member of the Hōzuki clan.

character.name: Yamanaka Santa
character.description: is a jōnin from Konohagakure`s Yamanaka clan.

character.name: Nara Ensui
character.description: is a shinobi from Konohagakure`s Nara clan.

character.name: Hoozuki Mangetsu
character.description: reputed as the Second Coming of the Demon (鬼人の再来, Kijin no Sairai),[2] was a shinobi from Kirigakure`s Hōzuki clan, and a member of the previous generation of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.

character.name: Ringo Ameyuri
character.description: was a kunoichi from Kirigakure and one of the members of the previous generation of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.

character.name: Kuriarare Kushimaru
character.description: was a Kirigakure jōnin and a member of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.

character.name: Munashi Jinpachi
character.description: was a jōnin from Kirigakure and a member of the previous generation of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.

character.name: Akebino Jinin
character.description: was a jōnin from Kirigakure, and a member of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.

character.name: Tajiki
character.description: was a shinobi from Kumogakure.

character.name: Shimo no Kuni Daimyou
character.description: He is the daimyō of the Land of Frost.

character.name: Yu no Kuni Daimyou
character.description: He is the daimyō of the Land of Hot Water.

character.name: Pakura
character.description: was a famed Sunagakure kunoichi during her lifetime.

character.name: Toroi
character.description: was a famed Kumogakure shinobi.

character.name: Chuukichi
character.description: was a famed Kirigakure shinobi during his lifetime.

character.name: Tango
character.description: is a Kumogakure shinobi.

character.name: Gari
character.description: was a famed Iwagakure shinobi and a member of the village`s Explosion Corps.

character.name: Hyuuga Hoheto
character.description: is a shinobi from Konohagakure`s Hyūga clan.

character.name: Zaji
character.description: is a shinobi from Konohagakure.

character.name: Kitsuchi
character.description: is a jōnin from Iwagakure.

character.name: Kussaku
character.description: was a shinobi from Kirigakure and part of the Allied Shinobi Forces` Sensor Division.

character.name: Ittan
character.description: is an Iwagakure shinobi.

character.name: Miru
character.description: was a kunoichi from Kirigakure and a part of the village`s Cypher Division.

character.name: Yuuhi Shinku
character.description: is a jōnin-level shinobi from Konohagakure and an Instructor that oversees the training of genin and chūnin-level shinobi in the village.

character.name: Uzumaki Ashina
character.description: was the leader of the Uzumaki clan during the founding of Konohagakure.

character.name: Taji
character.description: was an Anbu and medical-nin of Konohagakure.

character.name: Blue B
character.description: was a high-ranking Kumogakure shinobi as well as the predecessor of Killer B as the jinchūriki of the Eight-Tails.

character.name: Furui
character.description: was an elite shinobi from Kumogakure and member of the Eight-Tails Subduing Team.

character.name: Hikaru
character.description: is a shinobi from Kumogakure and captain of the ship which escorted the Konohagakure delegation to the island.

character.name: Suiren
character.description: was a kunoichi of Kirigakure.

character.name: Junsai
character.description: was a shinobi of Kirigakure.

character.name: Ganryuu
character.description: Ten years ago, Ganryū and his team were sent on a mission to retrieve a document taken by Kumogakure, with the assistance of Iwagakure. However, when the document was retrieved, the Iwa shinobi betrayed the Kiri team and killed Junsai and Suiren, the latter sacrificing herself to save Ganryū. This incident would become known as the Tragedy of Yosuga Pass which began the hostilities between the two nations. Since that day, Ganryū has held a deep hatred against Iwagakure.

character.name: Kiri
character.description: is a medical-nin from Kirigakure.

character.name: Iwaji
character.description: is a shinobi from Iwagakure and along with his siblings made up the Three Brothers group.

character.name: Iwakyou
character.description: is a shinobi from Iwagakure and the eldest brother of the village`s Three Brothers group.

character.name: Iwazou
character.description: is a shinobi from Iwagakure and along with his siblings, made up the Three Brothers group.

character.name: Suika
character.description: was a jōnin of Takigakure who defected and became a bandit.

character.name: Kokuyou
character.description: is a puppeteer who violently sought the hand of Shizuka in marriage even though she spurned his advances in order to rule the Nadeshiko Village.

character.name: Shizuka
character.description: is a kunoichi and the current leader of the Nadeshiko Village. She was destined to marry a student of Jiraiya that can defeat her, because of a law from her village.

character.name: Sagiri
character.description: Because of the village`s laws and customs, he and Shizuka were prohibited from being together, despite their intense love for each other. He nevertheless loved her very much and vowed to do whatever he could to change the laws of the village that he found ridiculous. However, he was later ambushed and killed as proof to show his lack of strength and unworthiness of being with Shizuka.

character.name: Tokiwa
character.description: is a kunoichi and the attendant of Shizuka, the current leader of the Nadeshiko Village.

character.name: Souta
character.description: During Pain`s assault on Konoha, Sōta`s leg got trapped under some rubble and one of the Animal Path`s Giant Centipede was bearing down on him. He was saved by Moegi who reunited him with his mother.

character.name: Iggy
character.description: During his childhood, Iggy made one friend with a boy named Banna because the latter was being picked on due to his appearance.

character.name: Banna
character.description: is a citizen of the Land of Water and an imposter who claims himself to be "Naruto Uzumaki".

character.name: Mozuku
character.description: is presumably the leader of the gang of the Mokuzu Island.

character.name: Ubau
character.description: is a pirate and the leader of the Sea Route of Silence Gang.

character.name: Honoka
character.description: was a kunoichi working with the researchers on a remote island.

character.name: Gataro
character.description: is a pirate from an island somewhere in between the Land of Fire and the Land of Lightning.

character.name: Bandou
character.description: is a jōnin from Benisu Island.

character.name: Hishaku
character.description: was a young sailor who dreamed of becoming a captain of his own ship one day.

character.name: Kiji
character.description: is a genin from the Benisu Island.

character.name: Sada
character.description: is a genin from the Benisu Island.

character.name: Yuusuke
character.description: is a fisherman in the Land of Fire. When he was a child, he and his father tried to catch a giant summoned marlin, they failed, resulting in his father`s death. Yūsuke became determined to avenge his father by catching the marlin.

character.name: Giant Marlin
character.description: This Giant Marlin was once a summon during the Third Shinobi World War who did not return to its birthplace because it had a shuriken stuck to its head.

character.name: Tokisuki Kabure
character.description: is a chūnin of Konohagakure.

character.name: Agara
character.description: was a chūnin of Takigakure.

character.name: Tenga
character.description: comes from a small country and is a member of the Daimyō`s intelligence bureau.

character.name: Tobimaru
character.description: is a messenger hawk of Sunagakure.

character.name: Takamaru
character.description: is a messenger hawk of Sunagakure.

character.name: Kaze no Kuni no Daimyou
character.description: e is the current daimyō of the Land of Wind, replacing the former wind daimyō.

character.name: Mizu no Kuni no Daimyou
character.description: He is the daimyō of the Land of Water.

character.name: Tsuchi no Kuni no Daimyou
character.description: He is the former daimyō of the Land of Earth.

character.name: Kaminari no Kuni no Daimyou
character.description: He is the former daimyō of the Land of Lightning.

character.name: Baku
character.description: is the former personal summon of Danzō Shimura.

character.name: Garuda
character.description: is a hawk and the personal summon of Sasuke Uchiha.

character.name: Aburame Shikuro
character.description: was a shinobi from Konohagakure`s Aburame clan.

character.name: Ootsutsuki Ashura
character.description: was the younger son of Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki. Though not the obvious choice to most, he would go on to inherit his father`s teachings, and as a result, would have to clash bitterly against his elder brother Indra. Asura is also credited with being the progenitor of both the Senju and Uzumaki clans.

character.name: Ootsutsuki Indra
character.description: was the first born son of Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki. He was initially thought to be the most suitable successor of his father`s teachings, however, it was his younger brother Asura that ended up inheriting this mantle — a decision that would lead the two brothers to fight against each other. Indra is also credited with being the creator of ninjutsu, and the progenitor of the Uchiha clan.

character.name: Chiyomatsu
character.description: is a samurai of the Land of Iron.

character.name: Yoshiteru
character.description: is a samurai of the Land of Iron.

character.name: Uchiha Shisui
character.description: renowned as "Shisui of the Body Flicker" (瞬身のシスイ, Shunshin no Shisui, English TV: Shisui the Teleporter), was an Anbu from Konohagakure`s Uchiha clan.

character.name: Kurozuka
character.description: was an Anbu and one of the last remaining members of the Land of Woods` Prajñā Group.

character.name: Gonbee
character.description: is a Kirigakure jōnin.

character.name: Heki
character.description: is a jōnin of Kirigakure.

character.name: Terai
character.description: is a former member of Konohagakure`s Anbu faction Root.

character.name: Furofuki
character.description: is a medical-nin from Konohagakure.

character.name: Tsuchigumo Touryou
character.description: He is the chief of the hidden village of the Tsuchigumo clan.

character.name: Benten
character.description: is a member of the Magaki Group, who aimed to steal the Tsuchigumo clan`s kinjutsu.

character.name: Uchiha Inabi
character.description: was an officer of the Konoha Military Police Force and a member of the Uchiha clan.

character.name: Uchiha Tekka
character.description: was a Konohagakure shinobi from the Uchiha clan and an officer of the Konoha Military Police Force.

character.name: Uchiha Yashiro
character.description: was a member of the Uchiha clan and the Konoha Military Police Force.

character.name: Hina
character.description: is a ninneko that lives with Nekobaa at an Uchiha supply base.

character.name: Denka
character.description: is a ninneko that lives with Nekobaa at an Uchiha supply base.

character.name: Daikoku Tenzen
character.description: was a crime boss who lost many men to the blade of Zabuza Momochi during the latter`s attempted coup d`etat of Kirigakure.

character.name: Tezuna
character.description: is a hostess in Amegakure and Ryūsui`s wife.

character.name: Kihou
character.description: was a shinobi from Otogakure, and a member of Team Guren.

character.name: Kigiri
character.description: was a shinobi from Otogakure and a member of Team Guren.

character.name: Akaboshi
character.description: is a member of the Magaki Group, aiming to steal the Tsuchigumo clan`s kinjutsu.

character.name: Kumadori
character.description: is a medical-nin of Konohagakure and Shizune`s junior. He is also a member of the village`s Analysis Team in the Intelligence Division.

character.name: Kousuke
character.description: was a messenger toad from Mount Myōboku.

character.name: Chuushin
character.description: is a member of the Magaki Group who attempted to steal the Tsuchigumo clan`s kinjutsu.

character.name: Tsurugi
character.description: was the head of Kirigakure`s hunter-nin.

character.name: Nangou
character.description: is a member of the Magaki Group, aiming to steal the Tsuchigumo clan`s kinjutsu.

character.name: Mitoku
character.description: is the current head of the Konoha Cryptanalysis Team and oversees the day-to-day activities of the division, taking direct orders from the Hokage.

character.name: Tonbee
character.description: is an elderly man and a member of the Tsuchigumo clan who was left to guard the sacred fortress of his clan.

character.name: Katou Dan
character.description: was a renowned jōnin from Konohagakure.

character.name: Harusame
character.description: was a Kirigakure shinobi and the former master of Utakata.

character.name: Yuukimaru no Haha
character.description: She was Yūkimaru`s mother.

character.name: Nawaki
character.description: was a genin from Konohagakure`s Senju clan.

character.name: Inuzuka Tsume
character.description: is a tokubetsu jōnin of Konohagakure, and a member of the Inuzuka clan. Her canine companion is Kuromaru.

character.name: Kuromaru
character.description: is a ninken from Konohagakure`s Inuzuka clan and Tsume Inuzuka`s partner.

character.name: Hyuuga Tokuma
character.description: is a shinobi from Konohagakure`s Hyūga clan. He was part of the revised Infiltration and Reconnaissance Party.

character.name: Ranka
character.description: is a chūnin-level shinobi from Konohagakure`s Infiltration and Reconnaissance Party. He is a former member of the Konohagakure Intelligence Division`s Analysis Team where he was in charge of autopsies

character.name: Naho
character.description: is a relative of the Fire Daimyō.

character.name: Sadai
character.description: is a mercenary missing-nin who entered the Land of Fire to kidnap Naho.

character.name: Baji
character.description: was the leader of a group of bandits.

character.name: Toufu
character.description: is a self-proclaimed ex-bandit.

character.name: Sonchou
character.description: He is the headman of an unknown village that was being terrorised by Baji and his gang of bandits.

character.name: Kouchou no Magomusume
character.description: She is the granddaughter of the Village Headman.

character.name: Jako
character.description: is a leader of a gang of thieves.

character.name: Suguro
character.description: is a thief that was part of Jako`s gang.

character.name: Sabiru
character.description: was a high-ranking shinobi in Konohagakure`s tactical division. He was later discovered to be a traitor and a spy.

character.name: Maboroshi Kisuke
character.description: was a member of Konohagakure`s Anbu.

character.name: Kisuke no Tsuma
character.description: She was murdered inside her own home while her husband Kisuke Maboroshi was away. Their house was subsequently set on fire while her body was still inside. It was later revealed that it was Sabiru who had killed her.

character.name: Sekiei
character.description: was one of the Kumo spectators who attended the Chūnin Exams` final round.

character.name: Hanare
character.description: is a kunoichi from the Jōmae Village.

character.name: Joumae no Sato no Kashira
character.description: He was the leader of the Jōmae Village.

character.name: Maruboshi Kosuke
character.description: is a genin of Konohagakure and is reputed as the Eternal Genin (万年下忍, Mannen Genin) as well as Konoha`s Strongest Genin (木ノ葉最強の下忍, Konoha Saikyō no Genin).

character.name: Shirakumo Hayama
character.description: is a jōnin of Konohagakure.

character.name: Kanden Tekuno
character.description: is a jōnin of Konohagakure.

character.name: Iwa Kunoichi
character.description: A jōnin-level Iwagakure kunoichi that led a battalion of Iwagakure ninja to attack Konohagakure`s border after its invasion by Sunagakure and Otogakure.

character.name: Nekomata
character.description: is a giant cat and the boss of the ninneko underworld.

character.name: Dread Lion
character.description: is a giant lion whose pawprint was collected by Itachi and Sasuke Uchiha for their Paw Encyclopaedia.

character.name: Yone
character.description: is a villager of the Genjutsu Tree Village.

character.name: Tanishi
character.description: is a young boy from the Genjutsu Tree Village.

character.name: Kandachi
character.description: was a missing-nin from Amegakure and was Hanzō`s right hand man, before the latter`s death.

character.name: Sukune
character.description: was a villager of the Genjutsu Tree Village.

character.name: Baira Ou
character.description: was a summon of Kandachi who used its abilities with hand seals. The Conch King and Kandachi were defeated by Naruto Uzumaki`s Big Ball Rasengan.

character.name: Kyodaina Arikui
character.description: It was giant anteater that was part of Condor`s ninja animal team.

character.name: Gameru
character.description: is a ninja who possesses one of Iō`s prototype ninja tools, Dakō.

character.name: Kusune
character.description: was a ninja who possessed Iō`s ninja tool, Tsurukame.

character.name: Iou
character.description: is a ninja weapon inventor from Konoha. He and his assistant, Shōseki, help make weapons for the village.

character.name: Shouseki
character.description: is a citizen of Konohagakure and the apprentice of weapon maker Iō.

character.name: Yaoki
character.description: is a shinobi from Sunagakure.

character.name: Korobi
character.description: is a shinobi from Sunagakure.

character.name: Tsukado
character.description: is a master swordsmen of an unnamed clan who had a vendetta against a man that killed a relative of his, Shikazo.

character.name: Katazu
character.description: is a swordsman who took his twin brother Kageki`s identity after the accidental death of Shikazo.

character.name: Kanabun
character.description: is the leader of the Kanabun Gang.

character.name: Shikazo
character.description: was a distant relative of Tsukado that Kageki accidentally killed.

character.name: Kageki
character.description: is the twin brother of Katazu and the man who accidentally killed Shikazo.

character.name: Dangou
character.description: is a citizen of the Land of Fire.

character.name: Umino Kohari
character.description: was a kunoichi from Konohagakure. During the Nine-Tails` attack, she received a severe injury to her back, which her son Iruka noticed, causing him to wish to stay and protect her. Despite her injuries, she was more concerned about Iruka`s welfare. Her name, along with her husband`s, was added to the Konoha Memorial Stone after they died.

character.name: Umino Ikkaku
character.description: was a shinobi from Konohagakure. When Kohari was injured while protecting him during the Nine-Tailed Demon Fox`s Attack, he offered to look after her. Ikkaku said he would look after her since it was the parent`s job to protect their child, not the other way around. He instructed Iruka to flee. Iruka did not listen, forcing other Konoha ninja to drag him away from the battle. His parents were killed by the Nine-Tails. Their names had been added to Konoha`s Memorial Stone when they died.

character.name: Hibachi
character.description: is a former academy student of Konohagakure, assigned to Iruka Umino`s class.

character.name: Unagi
character.description: is a former academy student of Konohagakure.

character.name: Kyuusuke
character.description: was once a shinobi from Amegakure and one of the original founding Akatsuki members.

character.name: Ise
character.description: was a doctor and a citizen of Amegakure, where he lived in a small village with his son and wife. During the Second Shinobi World War, Ise and his wife Fusō were providing humanitarian aid. One night during the war, Ise and his family were hiding in their battle-damaged house when Konoha ninja broke in looking for food. Ise and his family tried to sneak away but when they were detected. Ise fought the ninja to give Nagato a chance to escape, but the Konoha ninja, assuming the couple were enemy ninja, attacked and quickly killed first Fusō and then the devastated Ise. Witnessing this, Nagato unknowingly awakened his Rinnegan, and he subsequently killed the two Konoha-nin. Nagato buried his parents before leaving to search for food. The death of his parents is the first great tragedy of his life, and in his eyes evidence that the peace Konoha preaches comes at the cost of others` lives.

character.name: Fusou
character.description: was a nurse and a citizen of Amegakure, where she lived in a small village with her son and husband. During the Second Shinobi World War, Fusō and her husband Ise were providing humanitarian aid. One night during the war, Fusō and her family were hiding in their battle-damaged house when Konoha ninja broke in looking for food. Fusō and her family tried to sneak away but when they were detected she and Ise brought the attention to themselves to give Nagato a chance to escape. The Konoha ninja, assuming the couple were enemy ninja, attacked and quickly killed both of them.[2] Witnessing this, Nagato unknowingly awakened his Rinnegan, and he subsequently killed the two Konoha-nin. Nagato buried his parents before leaving to search for food. The death of his parents is the first great tragedy of his life, and in his eyes evidence that the peace Konoha preaches comes at the cost of others` lives.

character.name: Chibi
character.description: was an abandoned dog that Nagato found while wandering around the streets after his parents were killed.

character.name: Suiu
character.description: is a genin from Amegakure.

character.name: Samidare
character.description: is a genin from Amegakure.

character.name: Hyuuga Kou
character.description: is a shinobi from the main house of Konohagakure`s Hyūga clan.

character.name: Gamatama
character.description: is a tadpole from Mount Myōboku.

character.name: Gamaden
character.description: is an elite toad of Mount Myōboku.

character.name: Aburame Muta
character.description: was a tokubetsu jōnin from Konohagakure`s Aburame clan.

character.name: Mizunoto
character.description: is a former member of Konohagakure`s Anbu faction Root.

character.name: Kamano Saisu
character.description: is a chūnin of Konohagakure.

character.name: Togeito Tessen
character.description: is a tokubetsu jōnin of Konohagakure.

character.name: Yanagikage Kokage
character.description: is a chūnin of Konohagakure.

character.name: Meifu no Ou
character.description: is a being that is used by a wielder of the Rinnegan. This figure, like the Animal Path`s summons, possesses Rinnegan eyes, allowing a Rinnegan wielder to see through its eyes.

character.name: Tami
character.description: is a young citizen of Konohagakure.

character.name: Tamae
character.description: is a citizen of Konohagakure.

character.name: Kakoi
character.description: is a member of the Konoha Barrier Team.

character.name: Dokuraku Mawashi
character.description: is a shinobi of Konohagakure and a member of the Analysis Team in the village`s Intelligence Division.

character.name: Omukade
character.description: This giant centipede was a summon of Pain.

character.name: Oyone
character.description: is a medical-nin of Konohagakure and a member of the village`s Analysis Team in the Intelligence Division.

character.name: En no Gyouja
character.description: was the former leader of the Tsuchigumo clan and the grandfather of Hotaru.

character.name: K
character.description: is a chūnin of Kumogakure and was partnered with J.

character.name: Yotsuki Kiyoi
character.description: is a shinobi from Kumogakure and a member of the Yotsuki clan.

character.name: Senju Touka
character.description: was a kunoichi of the Senju clan prior to the founding of the hidden villages.

episode.title: 帰郷
Homecoming
Retour au pays
Ritorno a casa
Kikyou
episode.summary: A figure passes through the gates. It’s an older Naruto, who has returned from a long training journey with Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki is back! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暁, 始動
Akatsuki Begins Their Move
L`Akatsuki entre en action
Alba in azione
Akatsuki, Shidou
episode.summary: Naruto and Sakura team up and challenge Kakashi to a survival challenge to show off their progress. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 修行の成果
The results of training
Les fruits de l`entraînement
I risultati dell`allenamento
Shugyou no Seika
episode.summary: Naruto’s and Sakura’s combined skills force Kakashi to use his Sharingan right off the bat. Naruto masterfully unleashes his jutsu one after another. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 砂の人柱力
Jinchuuriki of the Sand
L`Hôte de Suna
La forza portante della Sabbia
Suna no Jinchuuriki
episode.summary: Gaara is quick to detect Deidara’s presence, and an aerial battle ensues with Deidara on his giant bird and Gaara atop sand. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風影として...!
As the Kazekage...!
En tant que Kazekage...!
Nel ruolo di Kazekage
Kazekage to Shite...!
episode.summary: Naruto and Sakura defeat Kakashi in the survival challenge. Tsunade assigns them to a three-man squad led by Kakashi, who tells them they are now his equals. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ノルマクリアー!
Quota Clear!
Mission accomplie
Missione compiuta
Norma Clear!
episode.summary: In order to protect his village from Deidara’s explosive clay, Gaara uses his chakra to create a giant sand shield. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 疾走れカンクロウ
Sprinting Kankurou
Cours, Kankuro !
Corri, Kankuro!
Hashire Kankurou
episode.summary: Gaara, his strength completely exhausted, is whisked away by Deidara. Kankuro ignores Baki’s efforts to stop him and immediately sets out in pursuit with a platoon to rescue Gaara. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 出撃, カカシ班
Excursion, Kakashi`s Group
L`équipe de Kakashi passe à l`attaque
Interviene la squadra Kakashi
Shutsugeki, Kakashi Han
episode.summary: On her way to the Sand Village, Temari encounters Kakashi and his team. Kakashi admonishes Naruto when he tries to rush ahead… Source: crunchyroll

episode.summary: Naruto and Team Kakashi arrive just in time to assist Team Asuma. Sakura and Sai are ordered by Kakashi to aid Shikamaru, who is battling alone. Source: crunchyroll

Il nascondiglio di Orochimaru

episode.title: 遭遇
Encounter
La rencontre
Incontro
Souguu

episode.title: 通い合う心
Communicating Hearts
Attaque combinée
Cuori comunicanti

episode.title: 雨一夜
Raining All Night
Une nuit pluvieuse
Notte di pioggia
Ame Ichiya

episode.summary: A black & white picture drama about an alternate universe. Naruto and the gang go to a "normal" high school and Naruto is a new transfer student. His ambition is becoming a "souban".

Deux talismans
I due amuleti
Futatsu no Omamori
episode.summary: At the Leaf Village Naruto is busy training with Gamakichi and Gamatatsu. But when he learns that Kakashi and the others are out on a mission to locate Orochimaru’s hideout, Naruto rushes to ask Tsunade if he can join the mission. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 見えざる敵

Un ennemi invisible

episode.summary: Team Yamato heads out to provide backup for Team Kakashi. Right before his departure Naruto gets a hint to perfect his new jutsu by entering Gamatatsu’s belly. Source: crunchyroll

Le labyrinthe des miroirs

Still unclear on what Orochimaru’s objective is, Tsunade cannot hide her irritation and anxiety. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 現れた標的

Obiettivo avvistato

episode.title: 荒れ狂う尾獣

Le démon enragé

episode.title: 霧の中で

Dans le brouillard
Nella nebbia

The team discovers that the enemy is after the Three-Tailed Beast, and faced with this unexpected development, Kakashi decides to ask for Tsunade’s guidance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: それぞれの想い

Chacun ses sentiments

Sorezore no Omoi

Red Camellias
Le camélia rouge
Camelia rossa

Il contrattacco del Segno maledetto

episode.title: 砕かれた約束

Memories of Sin
Obscur souvenir

Driven by his desire for the Sharingan, Orochimaru finally robs Sasuke of his freedom... Source: crunchyroll

Even with excruciating pain Orochimaru is preparing for his transference ritual, and Kabuto can feel Orochimaru’s further potential. Meanwhile Sasuke also senses the time is coming when he will have to face his mentor... Source: crunchyroll

On the way, Karin explains that the northern hideout is a site for conducting horrific human experiments. A ninja with abnormal homicidal impulses, Jugo is the sole carrier of the enzyme necessary to create Orochimaru’s curse mark... Source: crunchyroll

Suigetsu is surprised at the hideout’s low security level but is told that no prisoners can escape thanks to Karin’s abilities. What is Karin’s power that allows her to maintain order and an iron defense? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 結成!
Formation!
L`équipe au complet !
Formazione!
Kessei!

Assemble

episode.title: カカシ外伝~戦場のボーイズライフ~
