Chroniques de Kakashi - 1ère partie
Il ricordo di Kakashi

The future Fourth Hokage Minato Namikaze assigns young Kakashi, Obito of the Uchiha clan, and Rin, a medical ninja, on a mission to Kannabi Bridge..." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 消失

Esplosione
Shoushitsu

Created to kill Itachi, this fierce weapon is capable of destroying living beings from the inside using millions of nano-sized bombs. Can Sasuke escape this attack fueled by Deidara’s determination to destroy the Sharingan? Source: crunchyroll

After exchanging a few blows to test Sasuke’s strength, Deidara conjures up his specialty clay dragon and wages long-range attacks against Sasuke from high above. With Tobi’s backup support, the battle seems to be going to Deidara. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄昏

Fascinated by Sarutobi’s summoning jutsu, Jiraiya immerses himself in mastering the transportation technique. While training, Jiraiya accidentally transports himself to Mount Myoboku, opening the path to fulfill his destiny. Source: crunchyroll

Following the battle, the three ninja are named the “Legendary Sannin,” a title given to them by the enemy Hanzo of the Great Salamander himself. Source: crunchyroll

Invito alla festa
Utage e no Izanai

La verità

episode.title: 風来坊

The mission stems from a treaty between the Third Hokage and the En no Gyoja of the Tsuchigumo Clan... Source: crunchyroll

episode.summary: The Taka split up with the Akatsuki to hunt down the remaining Tailed Beast. At the Land of Lightning they go up against Killer Bee, whose attack utilizing Lightning Style and seven blades proves to be more than a match for them. Source: crunchyroll

Separazione

Yami no Keishousha

Nukenin no Kako
episode.summary: Yamato and Sai recognize their opponents as trackers from the Hidden Mist Village, but Naruto attacks without questioning. The Hidden Mist demands Utakata be handed over to them in exchange for Hotaru. Source: crunchyroll

Utakata appears, and Shiranami recognizes him as a bounty listed in the Hidden Mist’s bingo book... Source: crunchyroll

Utakata senses the chakra filling the atmosphere and terrain behaving oddly, and together with Naruto, they enter the cave where the anomaly is originating. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暗号解読

However, Pain uses the Ningendo’s power to learn of Naruto’s current location in Mount Myoboku. Tsunade clenches at the sight of the growing number of casualties within the Leaf. But Pain, who condemns the Leaf’s arrogance as a major nation, makes the choice to deliver catastrophic damage against the Leaf Village to teach them what true pain is. Source: crunchyroll

episode.summary: Guy recalls the time when he and Lee celebrated Lee learning the Hidden Lotus technique. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忘却の島
Island of Oblivion
L`île de l`oubli
Boukyaku no Shima
episode.summary: Going after Guy, who was whisked away by a giant bird, Naruto, Yamato, and Aoba arrive on an island where they spot a young woman. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 閉ざされた航路
The Closed Sea Route
La baie infernale
Tozasareta Kouro
episode.summary: As he prepares for the coming war, Shikamaru begins to feel the pressure of shouldering the lives of his friends. To help ease his mind, Shikaku sends his son on a mission to Mokuzu Island where Shikamaru meets up with Naruto. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 影の逆襲
Counterattack From the Shadows
La contre attaque des clones
Kage no Gyakushuu
episode.summary: Naruto’s Shadow Clones turn against their master after feeling mistreated and overworked. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 食うか食われるか!踊るキノコ地獄

episode.title: 木ノ葉の女子会
The Girls` Get-Together
Soirée entre filles de Konoha
Konoha no Joshikai

episode.title: 参上, 偽?ナルト

Un faux Naruto ?

episode.summary: Naruto and the others encounter a thief who claims that he is Naruto Uzumaki of the Hidden Leaf. The real Naruto easily takes care of the imposter and hands him over to a ninja who was after the thief. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナルトの愛弟子
Naruto`s Favorite Pupil
L`élève préféré de Naruto
Naruto no Manadeshi

episode.title: 撫子のくノ一
The Kunoichi of Nadeshiko Village
La femme ninja de Nadeshiko

episode.title: 仲間の背中
Friends You Can Count On
Couvrir ses amis
Nakama no Senaka
episode.summary: At the Ninja Academy, Shino recounts the time when he failed to capture a wanted thief. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ああ, 憧れの綱手様
Ah, My Longed-For Lady Tsunade
Maître Tsunade, mon idole
Aa, Akogare no Tsunade-sama
episode.summary: Tenten is helping out Lee’s training to enhance his Eight Inner Gates. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サイの休息
Sai`s Rest
Le dessin de Sai
Sai no Kyuusoku
episode.summary: While taking a walk through the Leaf Village, Sai comes across some kids who remind him of Sakura and Naruto. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説の猪鹿蝶
The Legendary Ino-Shika-Cho
Inochikachô
Densetsu no Inoshikachou
episode.summary: Ino, Choji, and Shikamaru run into Kosuke, an elderly genin who they saved in a previous mission. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キバの決意
Kiba`s Determination
La décision de Kiba
Kiba no Ketsui
episode.summary: Kiba trains hard to catch up to Naruto, who is now hailed as the hero of the Leaf Village, but with little success. Feeling desperate, Kiba asks Kakashi if he could train him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カカシ, 我が永遠のライバルよ
Kakashi, My Eternal Rival
Kakashi, mon éternel rival !
Kakashi, Waga Eien no Rival yo
episode.summary: As the Leaf ninja’s ship heads toward their final stop for supplies before entering the Land of Lightning, Yamato warns the crew to stay alert for enemies who could mimic both the appearance and chakra of their closest allies. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナルトの誓い
Naruto`s Oath
Le vœu de Naruto
Naruto no Chikau

episode.title: 上陸! 楽園の島?
Land Ahoy! Is This the Island of Paradise?
Débarquement ! Île paradisiaque ?
Jouriku! Rakuen no Shima?

episode.title: 鬼鮫という男
The Man Named Kisame
Un homme appelé Kisame
Kisame to Iu Otoko
episode.summary: Kisame’s escape is prevented thanks to Guy’s efforts. Aoba enters Kisame’s mind to gather intel on the Akatsuki.

episode.title: 珍獣VS怪人! 楽園の戦い!
Battle in Paradise! Odd Beast vs. The Monster!
Le Monstre contre la Bête ! Une bataille au paradis !
Chinjuu VS Kaijin! Rakuen no Tatakai!
episode.summary: Guy arrives at the Waterfall of Truth to help Naruto with his training. Instead he encounters Kisame, who has infiltrated the island to locate Naruto and Killer Bee.

episode.title: ありがとう
Thank You
Merci
Arigatou
episode.summary: Minato uses his Transportation Technique to move Nine Tails away from the Hidden Leaf Village.

episode.title: 四代目の死闘!!
The Fourth Hokage`s Death Match!
Le dernier combat du quatrième du nom
Yondaime no Shitou!!
episode.summary: Minato is forced to use his Flying Raijin jutsu and leave his wife Kushina behind to save their newborn son, Naruto, from a masked assailant.

episode.title: 狙われた九尾
Target: Nine Tails
Kyûbi convoité
Nerawareta Kyuubi
episode.summary: Sixteen years ago, Fourth Hokage Minato Namikaze and his wife Kushina are expecting their first child, much to the delight of the young couple.

episode.title: オレンジ色の輝き
The Orange Spark
L`éclat orangé
Orange-iro no Kagayaki
episode.summary: Inside his mind, Naruto continues his battle against Nine Tails to take control of its immense power.

episode.title: さらなる試練!ナルトVS九尾!!
The Next Challenge! Naruto vs. Nine Tails!!
Nouvelle étape ! Naruto contre Kyûbi !
Saranaru Shiren! Naruto vs Kyuubi!!
episode.summary: With Killer Bee as his new master, Naruto begins his training to control the power of a Tailed Beast. In order to do so, one must fight the Tailed Beast head on and absorb its chakra, converting it into one’s own power.

episode.title: キラービーとモトイ
Killer Bee and Motoi
Killer Bee et Motoï
Killer Bee to Motoi
episode.summary: Motoi warns Naruto that he is not yet ready to enter training to control the Tailed Beast. Undaunted, Naruto asks Motoi to tell him more about Killer Bee.

episode.title: 死へいざなう天使
The Angelic Herald of Death
L`ange de la mort
Shi e Izanau Tenshi
episode.summary: Madara appears in the Hidden Rain Village seeking the corpse of Nagato and his Rinnegan.

episode.title: 平和への懸け橋
The Bridge to Peace
Un pont pour la paix
Heiwa e no Kakehashi
episode.summary: Madara uses the forbidden jutsu Izanagi to escape Konan’s Paper Bomb trap.

episode.title: 芸術家再び
The Artist Returns
Le retour de l`artiste
Geijutsuka Futatabi
episode.summary: Kabuto and a reanimated Deidara attempt to grab hold of the jinchuriki, but are stopped by the Tsuchikage, who has come to protect Naruto.

episode.title: ドS級極秘任務
The Super Secret S-Rank Mission
Mission top secrète de rang S
Do S Kyuu Gokuhi Ninmu
episode.summary: The Leaf and Cloud ninja prepare to relocate Naruto and Bee, as the Akatsuki may already have knowledge of their location. Aoba assigns Naruto an S-rank mission to distract him from learning about their true mission: keeping the two Jinchuriki hidden from the enemy.

episode.title: 放送10周年4週連続特別企画「出会い」
Meeting
Rencontre
Housou Juushuunen Yonshuu Renzoku Tokubetsu Kikaku "Deai"
episode.summary: A look back into the early years when Naruto and Sasuke first met and got to know each other.

episode.title: 集結! 忍連合軍!
Assemble! Allied Shinobi Forces!
Rassemblement ! L`Armée de l`Alliance Shinobi
Shuuketsu! Shinobi Rengougun!
episode.summary: The Tsuchikage and his team manage to safeguard the Jinchuriki, but at the cost of losing Yamato to the enemy.

episode.title: 放送10周年4週連続特別企画「離別」
Parting
Séparation
Housou Juushuunen Yonshuu Renzoku Tokubetsu Kikaku "Ribetsu"
episode.summary: Naruto is determined to save Sasuke, who has deserted the Hidden Leaf.

episode.title: 放送10周年4週連続特別企画「亀裂」
Rift
Fissures
Housou Juushuunen Yonshuu Renzoku Tokubetsu Kikaku "Kiretsu"
episode.summary: Sasuke’s defeat to Gaara, and later Itachi, forces him to realize that he is not strong enough to get revenge against his older brother.

episode.title: 放送10周年4週連続特別企画「ライバル」
Rivals
Rivaux
Housou Juushuunen Yonshuu Renzoku Tokubetsu Kikaku "Rival"
episode.summary: During the Chunin Exam, Sasuke witnesses Naruto’s growth as a shinobi.

episode.title: それぞれの激戦!!
Battleground!
À chacun son combat !
Sorezore no Gekisen!!
episode.summary: As Darui and his First Company engage an army of White Zetsu, the remaining forces must deal with reanimated shinobi. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木ノ葉の天才軍師
The Brilliant Military Advisor of the Hidden Leaf
Le fin stratège de Konoha
Konoha no Tensai Gunshi
episode.summary: The Akatsuki dispatch an army of powerful reanimated shinobi and White Zetsu across the war zone, causing chaos within the Allied Shinobi Forces’ chain of command. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最初の敵, 最後の敵
The First and Last Opponent
Le premier ennemi, le dernier ennemi
Saisho no Teki, Saigo no Teki

episode.title: 宿敵との再会
An Old Nemesis Returns
Retrouvailles avec un vieil ennemi
Shukuteki to no Saikai
episode.summary: The commando unit is in hot water as they engage the reanimated Kekkei Genkai shinobi, which include Zabuza Momochi and Haku. Luckily, Kakashi and his unit arrive in time to assist them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 穢土転生の秘密
Secrets of the Reanimation Jutsu
Le secret de la réincarnation des âmes
Edo Tensei no Himitsu
episode.summary: Under the guidance of Killer Bee, Naruto enters the final stage of training to master the Tailed Beast Bomb, a Jinchuriki’s most powerful technique. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サイとシン
Sai and Shin
Sai et Shin
Sai to Shin
episode.summary: The Allied Shinobi Forces’ commando unit engages with the Akatsuki in the first wave of battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 開戦!
War Begins!
La guerre
Kaisen!
episode.summary: Kankuro’s commando unit enters enemy territory to set up a stronghold for the Allied Shinobi Forces. They are immediately ambushed by the Akatsuki’s own commando unit comprised of the reanimated Deidara and Sasori. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友のために
For My Friend
Pour un ami
Tomo no Tame ni
episode.summary: The Allied Shinobi Forces are on standby, ready to confront Madara’s army of reanimated shinobi and 100,000 White Zetsu. But distrust still exists among the Allied Shinobi Forces, who were once sworn enemies until recently.

episode.title: NGワード
Forbidden Words
Les mots tabous
NG Word
episode.summary: Atsui, Samui, and Darui face off against Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the legendary brothers from the Hidden Cloud, feared even by the Raikage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 金色の絆
Golden Bonds
Des liens en or
Konjiki no Kizuna
episode.summary: Darui manages to seal away Ginkaku. Fueled by the rage of losing his brother, Kinkaku transforms into a monster that resembles a jinchuriki’s Tailed Beast State. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ROAD TO SAKURA
Road to Sakura
Road To Sakura
Road to Sakura
episode.summary: Ino sees Sakura falling from the sky. Although she manages to save her, the shock of the fall has left Sakura with amnesia. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミフネVS半蔵
Mifune vs. Hanzo
Mifune contre Hanzo
Mifune VS Hanzou
episode.summary: Kankuro’s Commando Unit is cornered by Hanzo’s poison attack. Fortunately, Mifune and his Fifth Company arrive in time to provide assistance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 和解の印
Unison Sign
Le signe de réconciliation
Wakai no In
episode.summary: Naruto and Killer Bee rush to the battlefield when Nine Tails suddenly speaks to Naruto inside his mind. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 外道魔像の襲来
Attack of the Gedo Statue
La statue Gedô passe à l`attaque
Gedou Mazou no Shuurai

episode.title: 心の中の手紙
A Message from the Heart
Un message qui vient du cœur
Kokoro no Naka no Tegami
episode.summary: While training in Chakra Mode, Naruto senses the presence of the Nine Tails’ chakra seeping from Kinkaku outside. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 完璧な猪鹿蝶!!
The Complete Ino-Shika-Cho Formation!
La formation Ino-Shika-Chô parfaite !
Kanpeki na Ino-Shika-Cho!!

episode.title: 本当の優しさ
True Kindness
La véritable gentillesse
Hontou no Yasashisa
episode.summary: The Ino-Shika-Cho trio is ordered by Shikaku to take down the reanimated Asuma. Remembering Asuma’s final words, Shikamaru and Ino are determined to stop their former teacher. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 狙われた医療忍者
Medic Ninja in Danger
Ninjas médecins pris pour cible
Nerawareta Iryou Ninja

episode.title: 白ゼツの罠[トラップ]
White Zetsu`s Trap
Le piège des Zetsu blancs
Shiro Zetsu no Trap
episode.summary: Kiba, Shino, and Hinata are sent to investigate an area where the Akatsuki are supposedly getting through. There, the three are ambushed by a White Zetsu and get separated. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 秘話・最強タッグ!!
The Secret Origin of the Ultimate Tag Team!
Histoire secrète: l`équipe la plus forte !
Hiwa Saikyou Tag!!
episode.summary: Tsunade and the Raikage arrive to prevent Naruto and Killer Bee from joining the battle. But the two Kage fail to convince the Jinchuriki to turn back, forcing the Raikage to use extreme force. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 母ちゃん連合軍!!
The Allied Mom Force!
L`alliance armée des mères
Kaa-chan Rengougun!!
episode.summary: With many of the shinobi away serving in the Fourth Great Ninja War, the Leaf Village is left with just the mothers and children to protect it. Konohamaru is eager to guard the village but is quickly discouraged by the adults who tell him to just go about his day as usual. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 芸術家の美学
Aesthetics of an Artist
L`esthétique de l`artiste
Geijutsuka no Bigaku
episode.summary: Back at the Fifth Company’s camp, Kurotsuchi attempts to negotiate with the captive Deidara to find out Kabuto’s location, but is quickly rebuffed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 取り戻せないもの
Things You Can`t Get Back
Ce que l`on ne peut retrouver
Torimodosenai Mono
episode.summary: Still coping with the loss of her loved ones, Tsunade indulges in gambling and drinking. Around the same time, the Raikage Ay and his men are on a mission to steal a scroll from a certain village. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 灼遁使い! 砂隠れのパクラ
User of the Scorch Style: Pakura of the Sand!
L`utilisatrice de Shakuton ! Pakura du village caché du Sable
Shakuton Tsukai! Sunagakure no Pakura
episode.summary: A group of Allied Shinobi, including Omoi and Maki of the Sand, battle against several reanimated enemies. Maki recognizes one of them as Pakura, her former master who was a Sand Village hero. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 兜割! 通草野餌人
The Helmet Splitter: Jinin Akebino!
Fendeuse de Heaumes ! Jinin Akebino
Kabutowari! Akebino Jinin
episode.summary: Kakashi assigns Sai to take over for the Sealing Corps, who are recovering from sealing the reanimated shinobi. But Sai is not sure if he can handle the responsibility. Soon afterwards, the Third Company is attacked by Jinin Akebino. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二つの太陽!!
Two Suns!
Les deux soleils !
Futatsu no Taiyou!!
episode.summary: Fourth Raikage Ay attacks Naruto in an attempt to prevent the Jinchuriki from falling into Madara’s hands. Ay is unwilling to listen to either Tsunade or Killer Bee’s pleas to change his mind. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 力 episode2
Power - Episode 2
Force, épisode 2
Chikara: Episode 2
episode.summary: While investigating the village near Tonika, Kabuto confronts Naruto. An epic battle erupts as Kabuto uses the forbidden Reanimation Jutsu against Naruto. In the meantime, Dokku and the five survivors lie low at the village. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 力 episode1
Power - Episode 1
Force, épisode 1
Chikara: Episode 1
episode.summary: Naruto and his team are assigned a mission to identify and hunt down the perpetrator of the Tonika Village massacre. It’s been a while since Naruto has had a mission, and he’s pumped to take it on. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雷刀!! 林檎雨由利
The Lightning Blade: Ameyuri Ringo!
Les lames-éclair !! Ameyuri Ringo
Raitou!! Ringo Ameyuri
episode.summary: Omoi’s unit is attacked by Ameyuri Ringo of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen and loses one of Omoi’s men. Omoi attempts to avenge his comrade, but Nurui orders everyone to retreat. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脅威, 甚八・串丸コンビ!!
Danger: Jinpachi and Kushimaru!
Menace : Jinpachi et Kushimaru !!
Kyoui, Jinpachi-Kushimaru Combi!!
episode.summary: Kakashi races to the scene where the Seven Ninja Swordsmen Kushimaru Kuriarare and Jinpachi Munashi were last sighted. Enraged by the carnage they’ve left behind, Kakashi teams up with Might Guy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 賭けるに値する者
One Worth Betting On
Ceux sur qui il faut parier
Kakeru ni Ataisuru Mono
episode.summary: The Raikage Ay and his team suffer critical injuries during an enemy attack. Unwilling to sacrifice any more of his men, Ay seeks medical help from Tsunade, who just happens to be in the area. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 力 episode3
Power - Episode 3
Force, épisode 3
Chikara: Episode 3
episode.summary: Naruto and Sakura decide to stay at Shiseru’s house overnight to help watch over the survivors. Although the children cry and miss their deceased parents, Dokku and Shiseru try hard to bring everyone together as a new family. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 力 episode5
Power - Episode 5
Force, épisode 5
Chikara: Episode 5
episode.summary: After their defeat by the Nine Tails’ clone, Naruto and Dokku are taken captive by Kabuto. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 力 episode4
Power - Episode 4
Force, épisode 4
Chikara: Episode 4
episode.summary: A clone possessing the Nine Tails’ chakra emerges from Naruto’s body. Seeking more power, the clone goes on a rampage, destroying everything in its path. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 力 episode Final
Power: Final Episode
Force, épisode final
Chikara: Episode Final
episode.summary: The legendary Ama no Hoko imbues the Nine Tails’ clone with enough power to destroy the world. Naruto is overcome by its immense power and lies unconscious. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 父の想い, 母の愛
A Father`s Hope, a Mother`s Love
Les sentiments de mon père, l`amour de ma mère
Chichi no Omoi, Haha no Ai
episode.summary: Gaara leads the Fourth Company into battle against the previous Kage, including his father, the late Fourth Kazekage. The Fourth Kazekage attacks Gaara in order to determine if his son is truly worthy to be the current Kazekage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナルト, 参戦!!
Naruto Enters the Battle!
Naruto sur le champ de bataille
Naruto, Sansen!!
episode.summary: Naruto makes his entrance onto the battlefield and uses his sensory powers to detect and destroy the transformed White Zetsu clones. During the battle, Shikaku updates Naruto with what they currently know on Madara. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ついに接触!! ナルトVSイタチ
Contact! Naruto vs. Itachi
Rencontre tant attendue, Naruto contre Itachi
Tsui ni Sesshoku!! Naruto VS Itachi
episode.summary: Naruto and Killer Bee engage in battle against the reanimated Itachi Uchiha and Nagato. Itachi learns from Naruto that Sasuke has chosen the path of vengeance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖・蒸危暴威[ジョウキボーイ]
Terror: The Steam Imp
Peur - tyran de vapeur
Kyoufu Jouki Boy
episode.summary: Gaara and Ohnoki manage to overcome the Second Mizukage’s mirage attack. Having taken an interest in Gaara, the Second Mizukage decides to further test the young Kage’s skills. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 矛盾
Paradox
Contradiction
Mujun
episode.summary: Temari leads the attack on the Third Raikage using Wind Style, but even her strongest jutsu is not enough to penetrate the Raikage’s invincible armor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 水影と蜃と蜃気楼
The Mizukage, the Giant Clam and the Mirage
Mizukage, palourde et mirages
Mizukage to Oohamaguri to Shinkirou
episode.summary: The Fourth Company continue their fight against the reanimated Kage. Gaara and Ohnoki team up to hold off Second Tsuchikage Mu, while the remaining shinobi take on the Second Mizukage, who is willing to be sealed away. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 認められし者
The Ones Who Are Acknowledged
Estime
Mitomerareshi Mono
episode.summary: Itachi uses the ultimate genjutsu technique Koto Amatsukami to free himself from the Reanimation Jutsu. Itachi then joins Naruto and Killer Bee to fight Nagato, who is still under Kabuto’s control. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 過去の亡霊
Ghosts from the Past
Fantômes du passé
Kako no Bourei
episode.summary: Shikamaru, Choji, Neji, and Kiba find themselves up against some familiar faces from the past. The Sound Ninja Four have been brought back by Kabuto’s Reanimation Jutsu, and they are ready to seek vengeance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 心の目
The Heart`s Eye
Les yeux du cœur
Kokoro no Me
episode.summary: Hinata defends Neji from a White Zetsu clone while he’s recovering from an earlier fight. She then remembers the time Neji protected her the same way after she temporarily lost her sight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復讐者
The Vengeful
Vengeurs
Fukushuusha
episode.summary: Time is running out for the Leaf shinobi whose souls are trapped inside the Sound Four’s barrier. Ino and Shino exhaust their own chakra to keep their friends alive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄泉転身の術
The Underworld Transfer Jutsu
Téléportation Infernale
Yomi Tenshin no Jutsu
episode.summary: Shikamaru, Neji, Choji, and Kiba succeed in defeating the Sound Ninja Four. But the enemy uses the Underworld Transfer Jutsu to trap the Leaf shinobi’s souls inside a barrier. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 月光に消ゆ
Fade Into the Moonlight
Disparition de Gekkô
Gekkou ni Kiyu
episode.summary: Three years ago, Leaf Anbu Yugao Uzuki lost her lover Hayate Gekko in battle. Unable to cope with his death, Yugao has since left the Anbu and joined the Medical Corps. Meanwhile, Kabuto has reanimated Hayate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 落城
The Fallen Castle
La chute du château
Rakujou
episode.summary: The Leaf Shinobi succeed in bringing young lord Shu into custody, placing a disguised Naruto as his double. But Tatewaki soon uncovers Naruto’s identity and surrounds the intruder with his men. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: A級任務・御膳試
The A-Rank Mission: Food Fight
Mission de rang A - duel devant l’empereur
A-Rank Ninmu Gozen Jiai
episode.summary: Naruto arrives to help a team of Allied Shinobi Forces led by Karui, who are struggling against a reanimated samurai. Naruto recognizes the samurai as Tatewaki, a man he met during a past mission. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三日月の夜
Night of the Crescent Moon
Nuit de nouvelle lune
Mikazuki no Yoru
episode.summary: Yugao is ordered by Sukui to track down the reanimated Hayate. Still shaken by her lover’s unexpected return as an enemy, Yugao manages to catch up to Hayate and his men. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 老人と龍の目
The Old Master and the Dragon`s Eye
Le sage et l’Œil du Dragon
Roujin to Ryuu no Me
episode.summary: Might Guy arrives on the battlefield to stop a Reanimated Shinobi who he recognizes as Master Chen, the legendary Taijutsu User from the Third Great Ninja War. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: PROLOGUE OF ROAD TO NINJA
Prologue of Road to Ninja
Prologue to Road to Ninja !
Prologue of Road to Ninja
episode.summary: Madara is prepping his new jutsu Limited Tsukuyomi, choosing Naruto as his test subject. Meanwhile, Naruto is spending his day off alone in his room. Thinking that Naruto is lonely, Lee suggests they all go to the bathhouse . Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 名残雪
Lingering Snow
Neige persistante
Nagoriyuki
episode.summary: Naruto and the others finally regain their lost memories regarding Yota. Years ago, the Leaf Village kids came to befriend Yota, but the adults believed the young boy was a spy and took him away for questioning. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悲しい天気雨
The Sad Sun Shower
Triste pluie de beau temps
Kanashii Tenkiame
episode.summary: The weather-controlling enemy is revealed to be Yota, a boy who came to the Leaf Village years ago and befriended the local kids, including Naruto. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雨のち雪, ときどき雷
Rain Followed by Snow, With Some Lightning
La neige après la pluie et parfois l’orage
Ame Nochi Yuki, Tokidoki Kaminari
episode.summary: A reanimated boy who can control weather appears before Team Ino-Shika-Cho, Sakura, and Kiba, who are all fighting in different locations. To their surprise, the boy seems to know them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 穢土転生連合軍!!
The Reanimated Allied Forces!
L’armée de ninjas réincarnés !!
Edo Tensei Rengougun!
episode.summary: Kabuto reanimates an army of unknown shinobi led by Danzo’s former bodyguard Torune to retrieve the ones he lost to the Allied Forces. But aside from Torune, the reanimated shinobi are all weak and are quickly sealed away. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 傀儡に宿る魂
The Soul Living Inside the Puppet
L’âme des marionnettes
Kugutsu ni Yadoru Tamashii
episode.summary: A reanimated Granny Chiyo attacks Kankuro and Mifune’s team. Kankuro fights back by using the human puppet of Sasori. The sight of Sasori causes Granny Chiyo to recall the painful memories that led her grandson to create his human puppets. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 心の穴・もう一人の人柱力
A Hole in the Heart: The Other Jinchuriki
Le vide du cœur, l’autre hôte
Kokoro no Ana Mou Hitori no Jinchuuriki
episode.summary: Kabuto reanimates Fukai to attack Killer Bee and Motoi. Fukai warns Killer Bee to escape before being taken over by Kabuto. To everyone’s surprise, Fukai releases Eight Tails’ chakra and enters Tailed Beast State. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シノVSトルネ!!
Shino vs. Torune!
Shino contre Torune !
Shino VS Torune!
episode.summary: During their battle against the White Zetsu, Shino’s beetles detect the presence of another enemy. Leaving the fight to Kiba and the others, Shino goes to investigate and finds Torune preparing to unleash his forbidden jutsu. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 走れオモイ
Run, Omoi
Cours, Omoï
Hashire Omoi
episode.summary: The Allied Forces receive a report that Omoi has deserted his post, much to the Raikage’s shock. It is soon revealed that Omoi has defied orders to go save the Thundercloud Unit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 五影集結...!!
The Five Kage Assemble
Le rassemblement des cinq Kage !
Gokage Shuuketsu...!!
episode.summary: The power of the reanimated Madara Uchiha far exceeds what the Allied Forces expected. Despite the difference in power, the Third Tsuchikage, Ohnoki, along with Naruto and Gaara, refuses to give up. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うちはマダラ
Madara Uchiha
Madara Uchiwa
Uchiha Madara
episode.summary: The reanimated shinobi appearing before Gaara and Ohnoki is revealed to be none other than Madara Uchiha himself…which raises the question of who the masked man claiming to be Madara really is. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 増援到着
Reinforcements Arrive
Arrivée des renforts
Zouen Touchaku
episode.summary: White Zetsu’s ability to mimic people’s appearances has wrought confusion and distrust within the Allied Shinobi Forces. Naruto arrives to assist, and using his sensory powers, he identifies all the disguised White Zetsu clones, changing the tide of the battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 割れない仮面・割れたシャボン玉
The Unbreakable Mask and the Shattered Bubble
Un masque incassable et des bulles de savon
Warenai Kamen, Wareta Shabondama
episode.summary: Naruto and Killer Bee face off against the masked man originally thought to be Madara Uchiha, in addition to the reanimated Jinchuriki. Naruto is shocked when he recognizes one of the Jinchuriki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 四尾・仙猿の王
Four Tails, the King of Sage Monkeys
Yonbi, le roi des singes !
Yonbi Sen`en no Ou
episode.summary: Kakashi and Guy arrive in the nick of time to back up Naruto and Killer Bee. The fight intensifies even further when three out of the six Reanimated Jinchuriki enter Tailed Beast State, forcing Naruto and the others to throw in everything they’ve got. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人柱力VS人柱力!!
Jinchuriki vs. Jinchuriki!
Hôtes contre hôtes !
Jinchuuriki VS Jinchuuriki!!
episode.summary: Naruto and Killer Bee take on the six Reanimated Jinchuriki, who’ve been equipped with the Rinnegan. Using his past experience from fighting the Six Paths of Pain, Naruto devises a plan to stop the Jinchuriki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 九尾
Kyuubi
Kyûbi
Kyuubi
episode.summary: Naruto finds himself inside Four Tails’ inner world, where he promises to free Four Tails from Madara’s control. Listening in on their conversation, Nine Tails recalls all the time he has spent sealed inside Naruto. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 石の意志
The Will of Stone
Volonté de pierre
Ishi no Ishi
episode.summary: The Five Kage are outmatched by the real Madara Uchiha’s devastating attacks. Just when Third Tsuchikage Ohnoki is about to give up, he remembers the words of the previous Tsuchikage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇を見る眼
Eyes That See in the Dark
Les yeux qui percent les ténèbres
Yami o Miru Me
episode.summary: Suigetsu and Jugo’s search for Sasuke leads them to one of Orochimaru’s old hideouts where they come across his research data, which could tip the outcome of the Fourth Great War. Meanwhile, Sasuke finally sets out to settle his score with Naruto. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝利への予言
The Promise of Victory
Présage de la victoire
Shouri e no Yogen
episode.summary: The tide of battle is slowly shifting in the Allied Forces` favor, but many are uncertain that they really stand a chance against Madara Uchiha. To help boost their spirits, Shikaku orders Inoichi to send out a message to every member of the forces. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ツーマンセル
Two-Man Team
Équipe de deux
Two Man Cell
episode.summary: Naruto uses up the last of his chakra trying to free the Tailed Beasts from Madara’s control. When all seems lost, the Nine Tails finally acknowledges Naruto as its jinchuriki and offers its help. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 九喇嘛
Kurama
Kurama
Kurama
episode.summary: For years, Naruto was the target of Nine Tails’ undying hatred. But their time together has made Nine Tails understand Naruto more than anyone. As Naruto continues to try and free Four Tails from Madara’s control, Nine Tails begins to undergo a change. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 兄弟, 共闘[タッグ]!!
Sibling Tag Team
Frères unis dans le combat
Kyoudai, Tag!!
episode.summary: Sasuke and Itachi team up to stop Kabuto’s Reanimation Jutsu. But Kabuto’s new ability to use Nature Energy has made him a difficult target for the brothers to land their Susano’o attack. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 穢土転生のリスク
The Risks of the Reanimation Jutsu
Le risque d`Edotensei
Edo Tensei no Risk
episode.summary: Tsunade leaves her post as Medic Ninja to join the other Kage in fighting Madara. Meanwhile, Sasuke goes after Itachi and learns that his brother intends on stopping Kabuto’s Reanimation Jutsu. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 薬師カブト
Kabuto Yakushi
Kabuto Yakushi
Yakushi Kabuto
episode.summary: Kabuto’s past is finally revealed. As child, a woman named Nonou raised Kabuto at an orphanage in the Leaf Village. One day, Danzo and Orochimaru visit the orphanage to provide financial aid under the condition that Nonou work as their spy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 互いの木ノ葉
To Each Their Own Leaf
Chacun son Konoha
Tagai no Konoha
episode.summary: Kabuto attempts to bring Sasuke over to his side by pointing out that they both are fighting for the same goal: to bring down the Leaf Village. But Sasuke quickly rejects him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 発動・イザナミ
The Izanami Activated
L`activation d`Izanami
Hatsudou Izanami
episode.summary: Kabuto’s quest to discover his true identity has led him over the years to collect, analyze, and use the abilities of all shinobi within him, including Kimimaro, the Sound Four and Orochimaru. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 穢土転生・解
Reanimation Jutsu: Release!
Edotensei ! Rupture !
Edo Tensei Kai
episode.summary: Thanks to Itachi, the Reanimation Jutsu is released, and all the Reanimated Shinobi are returned to their resting places. But to everyone’s surprise, the real Madara still remains! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お前をずっと愛している
I Will Love You Always
Je t`aimerai toujours
Omae o Zutto Aishiteiru
episode.summary: The Five Kage watch helplessly as Madara activates his Perfect Susano’o to destroy them. Meanwhile, Itachi succeeds in undoing Kabuto’s Reanimation Jutsu. Before fading away, Itachi reveals to Sasuke the truth behind the Uchiha massacre. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イザナギとイザナミ
Izanagi and Izanami
Izanagi et Izanami
Izanagi to Izanami
episode.summary: Itachi activates the Visual Jutsu Izanami to trap Kabuto’s mind. Itachi then explains to Sasuke how Izanami was originally developed to keep the Uchiha from abusing the power of Izanagi. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復活!! 大蛇丸
Orochimaru`s Return
Orochimaru ressuscité !
Fukkatsu!! Orochimaru
episode.summary: Suigetsu and Jugo finally catch up to Sasuke. In order to learn the truth behind the Leaf’s actions, Sasuke decides to resurrect the one man who can help him find the answer—Orochimaru. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: てめーは誰だ!!
Who Are You?
Qui es-tu, à la fin ?
Temee wa Dare Da!!
episode.summary: Kakashi is disturbed to discover a strange connection between the masked man’s Transportation Technique and his own Kamui Jutsu. Naruto throws everything he’s got against the masked man and succeeds in shattering his mask. The identity of the masked man is finally revealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時空間忍術の秘密
The Secret of the Transportation Technique
Les arcanes du ninjutsu spatio-temporel !
Jikuukan Ninjutsu no Himitsu
episode.summary: Having absorbed the chakras of all nine Tailed Beasts, the Gedo Statue begins its transformation into Ten Tails. Naruto, Killer Bee, Kakashi, and Guy try to destroy the Gedo Statue but are stopped by the masked man who is able to phase through all of their attacks. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 力
Power
Chikara
episode.summary: The Chikara Arc (lit. "Power Arc") is the sixth filler arc from Part II of the series consisting of six episodes, spanning from episode 290 to 295. This arc is to commemorate 500 episodes total of both parts of the Naruto anime.

episode.title: オビトとマダラ
Obito and Madara
Obito et Madara
Obito to Madara
带土与斑
episode.summary: The identity of the masked man is revealed to be Kakashi’s old friend Obito, previously believed to have died in the battle of Kannabi Bridge. Naruto and the others are further shocked when they learn that Obito has been working with Madara Uchiha for years to orchestrate Project Tsuki no Me. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オレは地獄に居る
I`m in Hell
Je suis en enfer
Ore wa Jigoku ni Iru
episode.summary: After the Battle of Kannabi Bridge, Obito finds himself inside the hidden lair of Madara Uchiha, who saved the young shinobi’s life. There, Obito works to rehabilitate his injured body in the hopes of being reunited with Kakashi and Rin. But when Obito learns that they are in danger, he leaves Madara’s hideout to go help his friends and is forced to witness something he does not wish to see… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夢の世界
World of Dreams
Monde onirique
Yume no Sekai
episode.summary: Obito watches in disbelief as Kakashi kills Rin. Unable to accept the harsh reality, Obito decides to carry out Madara’s dream so that he can create an ideal world where Rin still exists. Taking on the name Madara Uchiha, Obito sets out to find Nagato, who possesses the Rinnegan necessary to accomplish project Tsuki-no-me. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 心を隠す面
A Mask That Hides the Heart
Le masque qui cache le cœur
Kokoro o Kakusu Men
episode.summary: After the end of the Third Great Ninja War, the Leaf Village is divided over who should become the next Hokage. Minato Namikaze is soon appointed as the Fourth Hokage, much to the annoyance of Danzo and Orochimaru. Meanwhile, Kakashi is haunted by the deaths of Obito and Rin, causing him to lose focus on his missions. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新生・"暁"
The New Akatsuki
Renaissance - Akatsuki
Shinsei "Akatsuki"
episode.summary: Danzo deliberately misleads Hanzo, telling him that the Akatsuki are attempting to sabotage the peace talks between the Hidden Rain and Stone. Believing his story, Hanzo sets up a trap to crush the Akatsuki for the sake of his people. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍び寄る影
Creeping Shadow
Une ombre furtive
Shinobiyoru Kage
episode.summary: Years ago, Yahiko, Nagato, and Konan form the Akatsuki to realize their dream of bringing peace to the Hidden Rain. Starting out small, they gradually gain recognition and support from other shinobi, including Hanzo the Salamander. But Obito, disguised as Madara Uchiha, warns the three that their ideals will never be realized. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 柱間細胞
Hashirama`s Cells
Les cellules de Hashirama
Hashirama Saibou
episode.summary: At the Foundation, Kakashi meets a boy who uses Wood Style, a jutsu that only First Hokage Hashirama was capable of using. Kakashi goes to Third Hokage Hiruzen’s library to seek answers and discovers records regarding Hashirama’s cells. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミナトの死
Minato`s Death
La mort de Minato
Minato no Shi
episode.summary: Kakashi becomes part of the ANBU Black Ops, an elite team of shinobi who are under the direct command of the Fourth Hokage, Minato Namikaze. Although he is highly regarded by his peers, Kakashi’s ruthless way of killing the enemy has earned him the nickname “Cold-blooded Kakashi.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 抜け忍・大蛇丸
The Rogue Ninja Orochimaru
Orochimaru, le déserteur
Nukenin Orochimaru
episode.summary: Orochimaru is forced to flee the Hidden Leaf after Third Hokage Hiruzen exposes his illegal experiments. Danzo, fearing that Orochimaru’s capture would lead to the exposure of his own involvement in the experiments, sends out one of his men to help the rogue ninja. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大蛇丸の実験体
Orochimaru`s Test Subject
Le cobaye d`Orochimaru
O Shinobi que Vive nas Trevas: O Objeto de Estudo do Orochimaru
Orochimaru no Jikkentai
episode.summary: While pursuing Orochimaru, Kakashi wanders into a village inhabited by the Iburi Clan, a group of people with the unique ability to turn into smoke. Kakashi is soon captured and learns that the villagers all serve under Orochimaru. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: それぞれの道
Their Own Paths
Jeder hat seinen Weg
Les différents chemins
O Shinobi que Vive nas Trevas: Seus Próprios Caminhos
Sorezore no Michi
episode.summary: Yukimi leaves the village to see the outside world, taking “Tenzo” with her. Kakashi tries to convince the two to return so that he can set a trap to capture Orochimaru, who is after Yukimi’s blood. But Yamato, who has grown attached to Yukimi, abandons his original mission to protect his friend. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 狙われた写輪眼
The Targeted Sharingan
Le Sharingan convoité
O Shinobi que Vive nas Trevas: O Alvo, Sharingan
Nerawareta Sharingan
episode.summary: Danzo orders Tenzo to kill Kakashi and take his Sharingan. Reluctant at first, Tenzo decides to carry out his orders after learning that the Leaf Shinobi has come to be known as “Kakashi the Friend Killer.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木ノ葉の忍
A Shinobi of the Leaf
Shinobi de Konoha
Konoha no Shinobi
episode.summary: After being saved by the target he was ordered to kill, Tenzo realizes that the man known as “Kakashi the Friend Killer” is someone who values the lives of his comrades more than anyone. No longer wishing to kill Kakashi, Tenzo abandons the mission and returns to the Leaf Village, fully aware that his actions will stir up Danzo’s anger. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暗部のうちは
An Uchiha ANBU
Un Uchiwa dans les services
Anbu no Uchiha
episode.summary: Itachi Uchiha is inducted into Kakashi’s unit as the youngest member of the ANBU Black Ops. Itachi’s father, Fugaku, is pleased, thinking this will grant the Uchiha access to exclusive, top-secret Leaf intel. But Danzo, who wants intel on the Uchiha, orders Itachi to betray his family and clan by acting as a double agent. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 担当上忍
Jonin Leader
Ninja d`élite
Tantou Jounin
episode.summary: Hiruzen relieves Kakashi of his ANBU duties and assigns him a new position as a Jonin Leader. Reflecting on his past mistakes, Kakashi decides to use the same test that Minato once used to measure one’s teamwork. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 惨劇の夜
The Night of the Tragedy
Nuit tragique
Sangeki no Yoru
episode.summary: Kakashi visits the Uchiha District and notices that the community seems more antisocial than the last time he visited. Meanwhile Itachi finds concrete evidence regarding the Uchiha Clan’s coup against the Leaf. The fateful moment is fast approaching… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クーデター
Coup d`Etat
Coup d`état
Coup d`Etat
episode.summary: Following the aftermath of the Nine-Tails incident, many on the Leaf Council voice suspicions that the Uchiha Clan were behind this tragedy. The Uchiha are then placed under 24-hour surveillance by the ANBU, which causes further tensions to arise. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第七班
Squad Seven
L`équipe 7
Time Sete
Dai Nanahan
episode.summary: Hiruzen assigns Kakashi to be in charge of Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura, three genin that bear a striking resemblance to the former Team Minato. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カカシの決意
Kakashi`s Resolve
La décision de Kakashi
Kakashi no Ketsui
episode.summary: Kakashi desperately tries to reach out to Obito, but his words fall on deaf ears. Obito instead accuses Kakashi of being trash, which angers Naruto, forcing him to step in and defend his Sensei. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 繋がれるもの
The Ties That Bind
Reliés
Tsunagareru Mono
episode.summary: The Allied Shinobi Forces begin their onslaught against Obito and Madara. But Ten Tails suddenly transforms and hurls powerful Tailed Beast Bombs toward distant towns. One after the other, the Tailed Beast Bombs find their targets. The shinobi wonder why Ten Tails is aiming so far away as one of the bombs heads toward HQ! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍連合軍の術!
The Allied Shinobi Forces Jutsu
L`art de l`alliance Shinobi
Shinobi Rengougun no Jutsu!
episode.summary: The barrier is shattered, and Ten Tails appears! With unfathomable power in its attack, it sends shock waves through the air! Kurama takes the lead and tries to go on the offensive, but is helpless against Ten Tails` immense strength. Soon both Kurama and Gyuki exhaust their chakra and fade away. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍び舞う者たち
Those Who Dance in the Shadows
La danse des Shinobis
Shinobimau Mono-tachi
episode.summary: Naruto is overcome with grief over Neji’s death, but Hinata`s words restore his fighting spirit. Shikaku outlines his final strategy before he dies, in which Nine Tails will send its chakra to increase everyone`s strength. United in their cause, Naruto and the shinobi set out to take on Ten Tails, determined that Neji and their comrades will not have died in vain! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全てを知る者たち
The All-Knowing
Le temps des réponses
Subete o Shiru Mono-tachi
episode.summary: Sasuke returns to the Hidden Leaf Village seeking answers, and standing before him are First Hokage Hashirama, Second Hokage Tobirama, Third Hokage Hiruzen, and Fourth Hokage Minato, all reanimated. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦国時代
Era of Warring States
L`époque des pays en guerre
Sengoku Jidai
episode.summary: Madara and Hashirama eventually become the leaders of their respective clans. As the fighting rages on between the Senju and Uchiha, Hashirama approaches Madara about an alliance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 柱間とマダラ
Hashirama and Madara
Hashirama et Madara
Hashirama to Madara
episode.summary: "Villages did not exist when Hashirama was a child. It was during this strife-filled time that he met Madara Uchiha." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 本当の夢
My True Dream
Le véritable rêve
Hontou no Yume
episode.summary: The Senju and Uchiha clans join together to build a shinobi village and fulfill their dreams. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風穴
Hole
Trou béant
Kazaana
episode.summary: The fighting rages between Naruto, who stands at the vanguard of the Allied Shinobi Forces, and the team of Madara and Obito. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サスケの答え
Sasuke`s Answer
La réponse de Sasuke
Sasuke no Kotae
episode.summary: After listening to what Hashirama and the rest of the former Hokage have to say, Sasuke finally understands how the Leaf Village and its shinobi came to be. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 埋めるもの
Something to Fill the Hole
Panser les plaies
Umeru Mono
episode.summary: Ten Tails is on the brink of its final transformation and begins to form a massive Tailed Beast Bomb. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第七班, 集結!!
Team 7 Assemble!
L`équipe 7 réunie !
Dai Nanahan, Shuuketsu!!
episode.summary: Team 7 is finally reunited when Naruto, Sakura and Sasuke join forces. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カカシVSオビト
Kakashi vs. Obito
Kakashi vs Obito
Kakashi VS Obito
episode.summary: Kakashi holds on to the hope that Obito can return to being the young man that he remembers. But Obito has abandoned the present as well as the memories of his friends and will not try to stop the Infinite Tsukuyomi. Realizing that nothing more can be done, Kakashi comes to a decision to protect the world, while his former friend is determined to end it! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなる三竦み
The New Three-Way Deadlock
Protection mutuelle
Aratanaru Sansukumi
episode.summary: Bearing a close resemblance to the Legendary Sannin, Naruto, Sakura and Sasuke make a stunning arrival on the battlefield with each of their summonings. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナルト対メカナルト
Naruto vs. Mecha Naruto
Storming Kyûbi (2)
Naruto tai Mecha Naruto
episode.summary: Part 2 of a special two-part extra edition! The townspeople are going about their daily business on the streets of the Leaf Village when someone suddenly appears and starts sending them flying! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 九尾強奪指令
The Directive to Take the Nine Tails
Storming Kyûbi (1)
Kyuubi Goudatsu Shirei
episode.summary: Part 1 of a special two-part extra edition! The townspeople are going about their daily business on the streets of the Leaf Village when someone suddenly appears and starts sending them flying! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 十尾の人柱力
The Ten Tails Jinchuuriki
Le récéptacle de Jûbi
Juubi no Jinchuuriki
episode.summary: Obito completely absorbs the giant Ten Tails, undergoes a transformation and becomes the Ten Tails` Jinchuriki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 突破口
An Opening
La brèche
Toppakou
episode.summary: Obito has gained complete control over his power as the Ten Tails Jinchuriki. His powerful, cold-blooded attacks force Naruto and his friends into a corner Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナルトが生まれた日
The Day Naruto Was Born
Le jour où Naruto est né
Naruto ga Umareta Hi
episode.summary: Minato is filled with regret during his confrontation with Obito. He thinks if only he had recognized Obito as the Masked Man during the assault on the Hidden Leaf Village, he could have stopped the attack, and maybe Kushina would not have died. The next day is the anniversary of Minato`s and Kushina`s deaths. Obito taunts Minato as a weak shinobi and seals every shinobi inside a barrier in order to destroy them all! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神樹
The Divine Tree
L`arbre divin
Shinju
episode.summary: Naruto and Minato combine their powers to perform a Sage Jutsu attack on Obito. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍の夢
A Shinobi`s Dream
Le rêve des Shinobis
Shinobi no Yume
episode.summary: The Ten Tails morphs into its final form, "The Divine Tree," and attacks the shinobi, absorbing their chakra one after another. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 希望[さき]を追う
Pursuing Hope
L`espoir
Saki o Ou
episode.summary: Naruto`s past, thoughts, and feelings flow into the consciousness of every shinobi, unifying their hearts. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仲間で満ちた心
A Heart Filled with Comrades
Comblés
Nakama de Michita Kokoro
episode.summary: Naruto and Sasuke size up Obito as the final battle looms. Working in sync, Naruto and Sasuke prepare to attack in the same way Madara once did, bedecking Kurama in the robes of Susano`o. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うちはオビト
Obito Uchiha
Obito Uchiwa
Uchiha Obito
episode.summary: Naruto objects to Obito’s claim that he is the second Sage of Six Paths and declares that he is Obito Uchiha. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ちゃんと見てる
I`m Always Watching
Je veille sur toi
Chanto Miteru
episode.summary: Pressed by Naruto, Obito remembers the time he, Kakashi, and Rin teamed up for the Chunin Exam and when he promised Rin that he would become Hokage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守られた約束
The Promise That Was Kept
Promesse tenue
Mamorareta Yakusoku
episode.summary: Naruto`s power of persuasion moves Obito`s heart. Due to the influence of the Ten Tails, visions of himself and Rin from the past appear in the inner realm and play havoc with Obito’s emotions. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最初の友
My First Friend
Mon premier ami
Saisho no Tomo
episode.summary: All the Tailed Beasts are freed, and old friends Kakashi and Obito come face to face with each other. What will Obito`s response be? Meanwhile, the Tailed Beasts and the Allied Shinobi Forces shift their focus onto their greatest foe, Madara Uchiha. Gaara is reunited with his former Tailed Beast, Shukaku. When Gaara asks Shukaku to lend his power to seal Madara, he refuses. Will their history of animosity prevent them from working together? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 憧れの姉さま
The Adored Elder Sister
Les deux sœurs
Akogare no Nee-sama
episode.summary: Hanabi adores her sister Hinata, who struggles to become a worthy successor to the Hyuga Clan. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハナビの決意
Hanabi`s Decision
Les sœurs Hyûga, ou le destin immuable
Hanabi no Ketsui
episode.summary: When Hinata is labeled unfit as a successor, Hanabi`s heart becomes bound to her destiny. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うちはマダラ, 立つ
Madara Uchiha Arises
Madara se relève
Uchiha Madara, Tatsu
episode.summary: Naruto and the Allied Shinobi Forces successfully extract the Tailed Beasts from Obito. Only Madara remains, and Naruto heads out to tackle this foe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 裏の心
The Hidden Heart
Au fond du cœur
Ura no Kokoro
episode.summary: With his newly revived strength, Madara doesn`t give in against the nine Tailed Beasts. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 本当の終わり
A True Ending
Le rideau tombe
Honto no Owari
episode.summary: Despite all efforts, Kurama is extracted from Naruto, and ultimately, all the Tailed Beasts are imprisoned inside the Gedo Statue. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなる中忍試験
The New Chuunin Exams
Nouvel examen de sélection
Aratanaru Chuunin Shiken
episode.summary: The story travels back to the time after Sasuke`s defection from the Leaf and before Naruto`s return from his two-year training journey with Jiraiya. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 中忍試験, 開始!
The Chunin Exams Begin!
Que les épreuves commencent !
Chuunin Shiken, Kaishi!
episode.summary: The Hidden Leaf begin preparing for the Chunin Exams. Ino and Choji ask Sakura to join their three-man team as a stand-in for Shikamaru, who is already a chunin. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三つの問題
The Three Questions
Trois questions
Mitsu no Mondai
episode.summary: The Chunin Exams finally begin and the proctor for Round One is none other than Shikamaru! The first exam is a written test. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リーダーに相応しい者
One Worthy as a Leader
L`étoffe d`un leader
Leader ni Fusawashii Mono
episode.summary: The genin are unable to figure out the answer and start to panic. Neji announces to everyone in the room that he will tell them how to answer the question. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二次試験, 前夜
The Night Before the Second Exam
Veille de la 2e épreuve
Niji Shiken, Zennya
episode.summary: On the night before the Second Exam, the entrants gather in the cafeteria, and a brawl breaks out. While the Hidden Leaf stand by helpless, the only one who can calm everyone down is Fuu from the Hidden Waterfall Village. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魔の砂漠のサバイバル
Demon Desert Survival
Le désert du mal
Ma no Sabaku no Survival
episode.summary: The Second Exam finally begins! To pass this stage, each team must take possession of both the Heaven and Earth scrolls and make it to the designated site in the center of the Demon Desert within 72 hours. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 体術使いとして...
As a Taijutsu User
Manieur de Taijutsu !
Taijutsu Tsukai Toshite...
episode.summary: Noting the similarities of their circumstances, Lee is outraged at the ones who hurt and belittled Shira and sets out in pursuit! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 極めし者
The Ultimate
Virtuoses
Kiwameshi Mono
episode.summary: Lee challenges Shira to a battle between taijutsu users! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逃走VS追跡
Escape vs. Pursuit
La traque
Tousou VS Tsuiseki
episode.summary: Kiba and his team are in pursuit of Hidden Grass Ninja who have stolen their scroll! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 諦めないド根性
Unwavering Gutsiness
Une volonté de fer
Akiramenai Dokonjou
episode.summary: Kiba and his team are in pursuit of Hidden Grass Ninja who have stolen their scroll! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: テンテンの悩み
Tenten`s Troubles
Le tourment de Tenten
Tenten no Nayami
episode.summary: As the team prepares for dinner, Tenten pulls out a scroll that contains all the ingredients for okonomiyaki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 閉じ込められた二人
The Imprisoned Pair
Prisonnières
Tojikomerareta Futari
episode.summary: An ancient ruin in Demon Desert comes crumbling down during the battle for the scrolls. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自分の居場所
The Place Where I Belong
Ma place en ce monde
Jibun no Ibasho
episode.summary: Ino, Sakura and Choji trudge across a desert under the blazing sun without any provisions. Ino and Sakura are arguing when a giant scorpion attacks and injures Sakura. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 山中一族・秘伝忍術
The Yamanaka Clan: Secret Ninjutsu
Les arcanes du clan Yamanaka
Yamanaka Ichizoku: Hiden Ninjutsu
episode.summary: As Ino and her team head toward an oasis, they are attacked by a team of Sand Shinobi comprised of Ameno, Shishio, and Kouji. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 呪いの人形
The Cursed Puppet
Le maléfice de la marionnette
Noroi no Ningyou
episode.summary: Sakura and her team continue their trek across the desert towards the goal. Their continuous battles have depleted Sakura`s chakra, so they stop to rest. Just then, they encounter a puppet manipulated by a rival team from the Sand and end up being discovered. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二人の背中
Their Backs
Derrière deux dos
Futari no Senaka
episode.summary: Ino and Choji fight to protect an immobilized Sakura although they have depleted most of their chakra due to the relentless fighting. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動き出した陰謀
The Hidden Plot Set Into Motion
Le Complot
Ugokidashita Inbou
episode.summary: Sand Jonin Fugi sneaks into the Demon Desert and creates a massive sandstorm in order to assassinate Gaara, the Fifth Kazekage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 狙われた尾獣
The Targeted Tailed Beast
La Traque de bijû
Nerawareta Bijuu
episode.summary: Gaara heads out to rescue Matsuri and the others but is attacked by a mysterious priest who binds him with a Chakra Chain to capture his Tailed Beast. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ネジの判断
Neji`s Judgment
La Décision de Neji
Neji no Handan
episode.summary: Neji and the team come across Matsuri collapsed in the desert and find out that Gaara is in danger. Meanwhile, the chains of a mysterious priest bind Gaara and Foo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未来に託す思い
Hopes Entrusted to the Future
Passage de flambeau
Mirai ni Takusu Omoi
episode.summary: As the Suna ninja search for their Kazekage, Gaara appears and orders for the continuation of the Chuunin Exams. He later communicates with Fugi via sand clone, making the latter realise that Houichi had failed in his assassination and had been defeated. As Gaara talks about his changes as a person and his hopes for the village, Fugi slowly realises that he had misjudged Gaara. Feeling ashamed of his actions in attempting to usurp Gaara, he commits seppuku. Meanwhile, Matsuri challenges Shira to a battle in order to see whether the will of the Kazekage has passed on to them, as his students. Shira then wins the battle, which prompts Matsuri to offer her team`s scroll; however, Team Shira declines due to them having the same scroll. Due to domestic complications within the village, Gaara announces the cancellation of the third stage of the exams. In order to assess the participants` performance in the exams, detailed reports of each team were sent to their villages, leaving the decisions of promotion to their respective Kage. After the exams, Team Ajisai is promoted to chuunin by Konan and is immediately assigned an S-rank mission, which results in Ajisai`s death. Her corpse is then delivered to a tower, where it is picked up by Konan. Meanwhile, Fuu and her team are ambushed by Hidan and Kakuzu. In Konoha, Tsunade promotes Kiba, Shino, Hinata, Sakura, Chouji, and Ino to chuunin, while declining the promotion of Team Komugi. Despite being unable to attain the two scrolls needed, Tenten and Lee are promoted to chuunin while Neji is given a double-promotion to jounin for his actions in saving the Kazekage. Elsewhere, Naruto and Jiraiya start to return back to Konoha after Naruto`s training. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: 死の際
On the Brink of Death
Quand vient la mort
Shi no Kiwa
episode.summary: Gaara transports Sakura and Naruto to the Fourth Hokage in order to have Yin-Kurama sealed into Naruto to save him. While being transported, Sakura attempts to heal Naruto. As the Nine-tails` chakra cloak disappears, Sakura discovers that her medical ninjutsu is unable to reverse the effects of the Yang-Kurama`s extraction and resorts to slicing open Naruto`s chest and manually pumping his heart. Meanwhile, Karin, distraught, goes after Sasuke to heal him. As Karin heads towards him, Tobi uses a miniature version of Hashirama`s Sage Art Wood Release: True Several Thousand Hands to stop her. Karin evades the attacks and uses chains to counter it. Tobi impales her with a wooden staff, which shoots out several branches. Karin, however, bites her arm and heals herself. Suigetsu then comes to Karin`s aid with his Water Gun: Two Guns technique. Juugo quickly follows and attempts to grab Tobi, who dodges but is unable to evade Orochimaru, who temporarily paralyses him with a cursed seal. Leaving Sasuke, Madara seals the Ten-Tails into himself and heads towards Obito, pausing for a moment to spit out the Benihisago and Kohaku no Jouhei from his mouth, which land on Lee and Guy, who are retreating with Tenten. When Karin senses ominous chakra where Sasuke is located, she rushes onwards. As Kakashi and Minato prepare to separate Obito and Black Zetsu, Yin-Kurama tells Minato to use his sensory mode. Gaara and Sakura then bring an unconscious Naruto and explain the situation to Minato. Minato tells Kakashi to deal with Obito, with Gaara volunteering to help him, while Minato prepares to seal Yin-Kurama into Naruto. However, Yin-Kurama is instead accidentally sealed into Black Zetsu, who intervenes in the process. Madara arrives at their location, berating Black Zetsu for the delay in retrieving the Rinnegan. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: 二つの万華鏡
The Two Mangekyo
Les Deux Kaléidoscopes hypnotiques
Futatsu no Mangekyou
episode.summary: Now that its master is nearby, Black Zetsu declares that nobody can stop it from handing Madara the left Rinnegan and the Nine-Tails` Yin half, detaching itself from Obito`s body. As Kakashi and Gaara prepare to attack in order to give Naruto the means to survive the tailed beast`s extraction, Black Zetsu finds itself unable to leave Obito`s body, due to him not allowing it to. Obito questions Madara about who he himself is to the older Uchiha, with the jinchuuriki explaining how Obito – as a follower of Madara`s ideals – is Madara, he who wishes to cancel the world created by the Sage of the Six Paths and to create a new one through the Eye of the Moon Plan`s completion. Seemingly giving in to Madara`s words, Obito starts walking towards his ancestor, with Minato trying to attack Madara as Kakashi and Gaara try to stop Obito, only for Madara to effortlessly stop them. However, Obito doesn`t take Madara`s hand, but instead pierces him in the gut, claiming that his current self is the same as the one who wanted to become Hokage – recalling Naruto`s words in the process. Obito goes on to extract fragments of the One-Tail`s and the Eight-Tails` chakra, ordering Kakashi to teleport Naruto and Sakura to the other dimension. After Madara stops Obito from going there himself, Kakashi runs to Obito`s side, with his old comrade commenting on how Kakashi always looks down upon him, remembering the old times in Konohagakure. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: 結成・ミナト班
The Formation of Team Minato
Les débuts de l’unité Minato
Kessei: Minato-han
episode.summary: Obito overhears some shinobi complaining about completing missions with Kakashi and asks them about it. They tell him that Kakashi ignores his team-mates to complete missions no matter what, which conflicts with what Obito remembers Kakashi saying. They advise Obito to be wary of being assigned missions with Kakashi. Leaving the Academy, Obito shares his concerns with Rin. He then comes across Kakashi and tries to strike up a conversation with him, only for Kakashi to leave, telling him not to worry. Obito trains in the rain to catch up to Kakashi with Rin encouraging him in the background. Hiruzen asks Minato to teach Kakashi some humanity. Later, Rin berates Obito for being late to his own graduation ceremony and takes him inside to re-enact the graduation, giving him his certificate and telling him they were assigned to the same team. As Team Minato gathers for the first time, Minato applies the bell test. The team passes, and Minato informs them they`ll start with simple odd-job missions. Obito completes the missions with help from the elderly people he often aids, leading Minato to appreciate Obito`s kindness towards others. Due to Team Minato completing all available D-rank missions, they`re assigned a C-rank mission to escort a group of foreign shinobi carrying a missive. During the mission, Minato notices they`re being surrounded by enemies and orders Rin and Kakashi to go on ahead while he and Obito fall back to take care of the enemies. Obito and Minato engage in battle, with Minato having to save Obito from an attack. Another group of pursuers catch up to Rin and Kakashi`s group. Kakashi tells Rin to go on ahead while he stalls the enemies. One of theirs escortees, however, is hit, and falls down from a bridge into a river. Reaching near their destination, one of the escortees thanks Rin and Kakashi, but the other two reveal themselves as traitors and attack their fellow shinobi. Confident that Minato won`t be able to reach them in time, the traitors prepare to attack Rin and Kakashi. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: お前はバックアップだ
You`ll Be My Backup
Tu es mon soutien
Omae wa Backup da
episode.summary: After being attacked by the two traitorous escortees, Minato and Obito arrive to back up Rin and Kakashi, but one of the two traitors escapes. The last escortee asks Minato to ensure that the scroll is real, as two of them were given scrolls. It is discovered that the scroll was a fake and the other escortee that fell had the other scroll. Obito immediately leaves to save the escortee and the others reluctantly follow. The escortee is found by enemy shinobi and is attacked; however, Obito and Kakashi arrive in time to save him. In the midst of the struggle, one of the pursuers grabs the scroll and they retreat. Kakashi leaves, claiming that completing the mission is his nindou. He goes after the group and attacks them. Obito sends a signal to Minato and tells him of Kakashi`s actions, who arrives just in time to save Kakashi and defeats the entire group. Team Minato returns the scroll and completes the mission. However, it is discovered that their team was sent as a decoy and that both scrolls were fake. Another group was charged with delivering the scroll to ensure it wouldn`t be stolen by enemy ninja. In the present, Madara launches two orbs at Obito and Kakashi to get the Rinnengan and the Yin-half of Kurama. Obito — with Kakashi`s help — transports himself to the other dimension. After convincing Sakura of his changed nature, Obito begins transferring the tailed beasts chakra to Naruto. In the real world, Guy arrives in the nick of time, saving Kakashi from Madara`s attack. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: 碧き猛獣VS六道マダラ
The Blue Beast vs Six Paths Madara
La Panthère de jade contre les six chemins de Madara
Aoki Moujuu vs Rikudou Madara
episode.summary: As Orochimaru and his team reach Sasuke, they realise that the unknown chakra signature is that of Kabuto. Since Kabuto has assimilated other people into himself, his chakra signature has become unknown, explaining why Karin could not identify the person near to Sasuke. Kabuto explains that he has decided to save Sasuke, after coming to realise who he was, thanks to the Izanami. Elsewhere, Guy releases the Gate of Wonder, which fails to damage Madara. Knowing that the Seventh Gate failed, Guy realises he must use the Gate of Death, which he knows will kill him. He remembers his time with his father, where he failed to graduate and decided to run 500 laps in order to enter the Academy as an alternate student. However, Guy is unable to finish running 500 laps and ends up passing out while the Third Hokage watches him from the window of the Academy. As Guy apologises to his father only to be scolded for not having faith, Guy becomes frustrated with his father being mocked and attacks two older ninja, only to end up being brutalised. He`s saved from further harm by Kakashi taking out the older ninja. After being saved by Kakashi, Guy watches him leaving with his father. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: パパの青春
Papa`s Youth
La jeunesse de papa
Papa no Seishun
episode.summary: A young Guy questions his father Might Duy on being optimistic despite criticisms from other people in the village. Duy reiterated that becoming strong is not about winning or defeating enemies, but protecting something precious. Guy continues his training and frequently sees Kakashi, which inspires him to challenge. However, Duy disagrees Guy`s proposition on challenging Kakashi and suggests to impose a self-rule. Guy follows and exerts his training just not to challenge Kakashi. After hardworking and perseverance, Guy finally graduates from the Academy and start accepting missions. Guy also notices his father taking lousy, low rank missions. Before departing on a mission, Guy overhears a conversation between his father and a jounin which seems to be dissatisfied with Duy`s performance. He also realises that his father`s seemingly under-performance is due to his training on the Eight Gates every night, which Duy passes and trains Guy on using the forbidden jutsu. During a mission, Guy`s team encounters the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist. Guy felt nervous from the swordsmen, realising the danger it poses until Duy appears and protects his son while using the Eight Gates. Shifting to present time, Guy finally activates the eighth gate. Encloaked in red vapor, Guy advances to Madara to unleash the Evening Elephant. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: 八門遁甲の陣
The Eight Inner Gates Formation
La formation de l’ouverture des huit portes célestes
Hachi Mon Tonkou no Jin
episode.summary: Guy begins his assault on Madara, using the Evening Elephant to attack, however the pain of using the Eight Gates Released Formation causes him to prematurely end the attack. Madara returns to the sky, excited over the opportunity to face a user of all Eight Gates. Kicking the air in order to match Madara`s flight, Guy prepares to use the Evening Elephant again. Minato tells the others they have to help Guy, and gives Lee one of his kunai. As Guy begins his second use of the Evening Elephant, Madara shields his attack with his Truth-Seeking Ball, countering with one of his own. Lee throws the kunai between Guy and the attack, so that Minato can use the Flying Thunder God Technique to send the orbs away. Gaara then lifts Kakashi close to Madara so that he can use Kamui to create an opening in Madara`s defence. Guy lands the final "step" of the Evening Elephant directly into Madara, pushing him through the back of his shield. Despite this devastating attack, Madara stands once again, stating his excitement hasn`t reached this level since fighting Hashirama. Elsewhere, Naruto wakes up and wonders if he has died. However a floating man tells him that he is not. Naruto questions the old man as to who he is, and is shocked to hear that the man is the Hagoromo Ootsutsuki, the Sage of Six Paths. Hagoromo tells Naruto of the cycle of reincarnation of the Sage`s sons, Indra and Asura, and tells Naruto of the latter`s lack of ability, especially in comparison to that of the elder brother. When Naruto recognises these traits in himself, Hagoromo reveals to him that he is the reincarnation of his youngest son. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: 六道仙人
The Sage of the Six Paths
Rikudô l`Ermite
Rikudou Sennin
episode.summary: Hagoromo reveals to Naruto that he is the reincarnation of his younger son: Asura. He asks Naruto if he can guess who Indra`s reincarnation is, and Naruto correctly concludes it is Sasuke. At the same time, Hagoromo has the same conversation with Sasuke, revealing his status as Indra`s reincarnation, and having him realise Naruto is Asura`s. Hagoromo goes on to explain that Hashirama and Madara are the previous reincarnations, and that by taking Hashirama`s power, Madara recreated Hagoromo`s chakra, awakening the Rinnegan, despite leaving Indra`s descendants instructions against it. Hagoromo explains that his mother Kaguya used her powerful doujutsu to rule over humanity, and that Madara is on his way to acquiring that same power. Hagoromo asks Naruto to stop Madara, who accepts his request. The chakra of the tailed beasts converge, and Hagoromo notes the prophecy he heard long ago has come true. As entrusting only Asura had created so much conflict, Hagoromo asks Sasuke to cooperate as well, and entrusts both Naruto and Sasuke with his powers. Having survived and being impressed by Guy`s Evening Elephant, Madara asks Guy to keep on fighting him, deeming him the strongest taijutsu user he has ever faced. Guy prepares to use his last technique while Naruto and Sasuke awaken. As Guy prepares the Night Guy, Kakashi recalls his father`s accurate prediction of Guy`s potential when they were children. Guy`s powerful kick lands on Madara, through the Shinju, almost killing him. Guy`s body begins to disintegrate and an elated Madara, regenerating from the attack, attempts to finish him with a Truth-Seeking Ball only for Naruto to kick it away, much to his surprise. Naruto touches Guy, stopping his life force from fading. Madara notices a change in Naruto, wondering what Obito did. Naruto declares he feels he can change the world with his new powers. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: 受け継がれるもの
The Ones Who Will Inherit
Hérédité
Uketsugareru Mono
episode.summary: Konohamaru cleans Naruto`s apartment. Soon after that, Naruto returns home from his long training, with Team Ebisu and Sakura meeting up with him. Konohamaru shows Naruto his improved Sexy Technique, but the boy reveals that he has already created an advanced version of the technique, only to be hit by Sakura for being a pervert. Naruto and Konohamaru then come back to Naruto`s apartment, with the boy putting his old jacket into one of the drawers for safe keeping. After that, Naruto is shown to begin teaching Konohamaru Rasengan, who`s imagining that he`s being taught an advanced version of the Sexy Technique. Naruto then impresses Konohamaru by showing him the Rasengan first-hand and gives him a water balloon, telling him to practice rotation. Soon after that, Gaara is kidnapped by the Akatsuki and Naruto leaves to help him. In the meantime, Konohamaru, not comprehending the rotation aspect of the technique, asks Kiba, Chouji and Hinata to help him out, but to no avail. Deciding to heat-up the sexiness of his Sexy Technique, Team Ebisu goes to Ebisu for some help, thinking that it would help Konohamaru learn the Rasengan more quickly. Taking a few magazines from his sensei, the team takes their leave. Later, using the Transformation Technique to transform into a girl spinning a hula-hoop, Konohamaru, with enough practice, pops the water balloon using chakra and shows it to Naruto, who gives him a rubber ball and tells him to practice power. Having no idea how to do it, Konohamaru, alongside Moegi and Udon, go ask Ebisu for help again. Meeting him in the park, alongside Iruka, all three transform into sexy girls and asks which one, in his opinion, is the most attractive. Ebisu then gives some advice to Konohamaru, which inspires him to use his Sexy Technique to transform into a girl, hiding her breasts and then revealing them, sending Ebisu flying with a bloody nose, in a comedic fashion. Soon after that, Konohamaru begins training again, determined to learn the technique. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: ナルトのライバル
Naruto`s Rival
Le rival de Naruto
Naruto no Rival
episode.summary: Tsunade is frustrated that Orochimaru has escaped her grasp again. Shizune informs her that Konohamaru has been learning the Rasengan from Naruto, to which she makes a bet whether he will master it or not. Meanwhile, Konohamaru uses his Sexy Technique to pop the rubber ball, given to him by Naruto. The boy then decides to visit Naruto and show his accomplishment, learning that he has been practicing Wind Release. Konohamaru then shows him that now he can burst the rubber ball, with Yamato and Kakashi flustered by how he does it — using Sexy Technique. Proud of Konohamaru, Naruto creates a shadow clone and tells him to do this next, only for the boy to reply that he can`t. Konohamaru then issues a challenge to Naruto, saying that he will learn the Shadow Clone Technique before Naruto can complete his current step in Wind Release training. After a few failed attempts at the technique, Konohamaru collapses, with Moegi and Udon going to Sakura for some food pills, which she has been giving to Naruto for training. After a few days, Naruto completes his training and Konohamaru loses the challenge. Later, Kotetsu and Izumo inform Konohamaru and Naruto about the death of Asuma Sarutobi and, soon after that, the jounin`s funeral is held. While Naruto fought Kakuzu, Konohamaru managed to learn the Shadow Clone Technique. Konohamaru then begins the final step of the training, with both him and Naruto forming the Rasengan with Tsunade and Shizune observing them. After leaving for Mount Myouboku to learn Senjutsu, Naruto asks Konohamaru to take care of his treasure - his old orange jacket. During Pain`s Assault, Konohamaru manages to use the Rasengan, and with it, defeat Naraka Path. When Naruto returns, Konohamaru reveals that, despite the village`s explosion, he managed to save Naruto`s old jacket, by storing it in the village`s valuables storage in the evacuation shelter. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: 立つ
To Rise Up
Debout
Tatsu
episode.summary: Madara is puzzled by Naruto stopping Guy`s chakra from fading. Madara defends himself from Naruto`s punch with his remaining Truth-Seeking Ball, noticing an increase in Naruto`s power. With Son Gokuu`s chakra, Naruto creates a lava Rasenshuriken and attacks Madara and the tree with it, dodging Madara`s Limbo: Border Jail. Naruto`s attack severs the tree, which appears to tell Madara to absorb it, which Madara does. Naruto takes Guy to Lee and Gaara. In Kamui`s dimension, Sakura thanks Obito for saving Naruto, and Obito has a request for her. Sasuke frees Tobirama from Madara`s black rods, Tobirama notices a change in him, and Sasuke asks if Tobirama can teleport him. Madara recovers from having absorbed the tree, telling Naruto he can`t be defeated. Naruto picks up one of his father`s kunai, powering up with his own Truth-Seeking Balls, that he would not be alone, as Sasuke appears beside him with a newly awakened Rinnegan. Madara notes he himself possesses both their powers, and prepares to fight. Madara attacks, but Naruto deflects the attack and Sasuke evades it completely. Madara realises they have discovered the working of his Limbo when Naruto and Sasuke ready their jutsu. Madara escapes their simultaneous attack by sacrificing his Limbo, and flies away to steal Kakashi`s Sharingan. Sasuke manages to cut Madara in half, but he manages to warp into Kamui`s dimension. There he attacks Sakura, who at Obito`s request, is about to destroy the Rinnegan so Black Zetsu can`t get it for Madara. Source: naruto.wikia.com

episode.title: 無限の夢
The Infinite Dream
Rêve éternel
Mugen no Yume
episode.summary: Madara now possesses the Rinnegan in both eyes, and he is the strongest, most despicable enemy the newly reunited Team 7 has ever faced. Kakashi calls upon Team 7 to recall their first lesson with the bells, and to use teamwork! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無限月読
The Infinite Tsukuyomi
Les Arcanes Lunaires Infinis
Mugen Tsukuyomi
