episode.summary: Madara activates the Infinite Tsukuyomi, and anyone exposed to the light of the full moon--including shinobi and ordinary citizens--loses consciousness. Once ensnared, there is no escape from the Infinite Tsukuyomi. Will mankind be destined to live in a dreamworld forever? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夢の世界へ
To the Dream World
Vers le monde onirique
Yume no Sekai e
episode.summary: Tenten falls under the Infinite Tsukuyomi and wakes up in the Hidden Leaf Village. When Lee and Guy Sensei appear, Tenten is relieved to see that she is not alone. But her joy is short-lived, as both men act oddly and are dressed stylishly—just where has she been transported to? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: テンテンの居場所
Where Tenten Belongs
La place de Tenten
Tenten no Ibasho
episode.summary: Tenten falls under the Infinite Tsukuyomi and wakes up in the Hidden Leaf Village. When Lee and Guy Sensei appear, Tenten is relieved to see that she is not alone. But her joy is short-lived, as both men act oddly and are dressed stylishly—just where has she been transported to? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キラービー落風伝・天の巻
Killer Bee Rappuden: Part 1
Killer Bee fait son show, 1er volet
Killer Bee Rappuuden: Ten no Maki
episode.summary: Killer Bee gets caught in the Infinite Tsukuyomi and begins dreaming. In his dream, Jinchuriki are being stripped of their Tailed Beast powers by the Akatsuki. Bee is determined to rescue those who have been captured, and vows to resist the Akatsuki who are coming after him! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 落ちこぼれ忍者
The Loser Ninja
Le raté
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Ochikobore Ninja
episode.summary: With the exception of Naruto’s Team 7, which is protected by the Susano’o, all other shinobi have been swept into a dream world by the Infinite Tsukuyomi. Even the Hokage, Tsunade, has fallen into a dream state. She awakens to find herself in the Leaf Village, where she discovers Jiraiya`s final book, entitled "Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls," and begins to read... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あの笑顔をもう一度
To See That Smile, Just One More Time
Ce sourire
Ano Egao o Mou Ichido
episode.summary: Karin is caught within the Infinite Tsukuyomi and dreams of her past. She was born into the Uzumaki Clan and has the unique ability to heal anyone who bites into her. Driven out of her village, the Hidden Grass takes her in, only to use her for this ability. Karin has no choice but to endure constant suffering in order to survive. She is later chosen to enter the Chunin Exams, where Sasuke saves her life. Karin has never forgotten what he did for her—or his smile. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キラービー落風伝・地の巻
Killer Bee Rappuden: Part 2
Killer Bee fait son show, 2nd volet
Killer Bee Rappuuden: Chi no Maki
episode.summary: The Akatsuki summoned the Ten Tails, but the Princess of Rappu Castle sealed it away safely. Unfortunately, the seal will come undone on the next full moon. Now Killer Bee is determined to gather the power of all nine Jinchuriki before the next full moon and protect the princess. But one by one, adversaries who want to stop Bee appear, beginning with Itachi and Deidara, then Orochimaru, Kabuto and Sasuke! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Jump Festa 2013 - サニー・サイド・バトル!!!
Jump Festa 2013 - Sunny Side Battle!
Jump Festa 2013: Sunny Side Battle!!!
episode.summary: A comedy-filled filler with a plot revolving around the two Uchiha Brothers, Mangekyo Sharingan, chickens, and fried eggs. Source: TheTVDB.com

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 出撃・探索任務
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - The Search Mission
Mission de secours
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Shutsugeki: Tansaku Ninmu
episode.summary: Tsunade continues to read Jiraiya’s novel. Chunin- and jonin-level ninja have gone missing, and the Fourth Hokage, Minato, orders a search mission with teams of genin led by Guy and Kurenai. Kakashi’s Team 7 is also dispatched, but the hero Naruto Uzumaki, despite being the Hokage’s son, has the misfortune of being labeled a loser. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 封印されし力
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - The Sealed Power
Le pouvoir scellé
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Fuuin Sareshi Chikara
episode.summary: The Masked Man is satisfied that the Hidden Leaf Genin chose the importance of life over their mission, but orders his team to continue their surveillance. Meanwhile, Naruto is frustrated at his inabilities, and recalls why his father Minato sealed the Nine Tails inside of him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 仮面の男
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - The Masked Man
L`homme masqué
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Kamen no Otoko
episode.summary: The Masked Man shows Neji and Naruto images of past incidents that occurred in the Leaf Village. Meanwhile, Shikamaru and friends join up with Team Jiraiya to rescue the children. After fighting side by side with the Leaf, Yahiko and the others seem to have a change of heart. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 優先順位
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - Order of Priority
Le sens des priorités
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Yuusen Jun`i
episode.summary: Team Jiraiya, Shikamaru, and his Leaf teammates are lured into a mysterious village during their battle. A couple children from the village get caught in the crossfire and fall into a cave-in. Yahiko’s team rushes to the rescue, but Shikamaru doesn’t budge. Meanwhile, Naruto and Neji’s teams rendezvous, but a mysterious voice addresses them out of nowhere! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ チーム・ジライヤ
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - Team Jiraiya
La team Jiraya
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Team Jiraiya
episode.summary: Tsunade continues to read Jiraiya’s novel. Chunin- and jonin-level ninja have gone missing, and the Fourth Hokage, Minato, orders a search mission with teams of genin led by Guy and Kurenai. Kakashi’s Team 7 is also dispatched, but the hero Naruto Uzumaki, despite being the Hokage’s son, has the misfortune of being labeled a loser. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 掟か, 仲間か
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - The Rules or a Comrade
Compagnons ou mission
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Okite ka, Nakama ka
episode.summary: Sasuke and Sakura join up with the others, but the Puppet User appears and blocks their path back to the Hidden Leaf Village. Sasuke wants to bring down the puppets and rush back to report to the Fourth Hokage, but Shikamaru and the others insist on staying and rescuing the jonin. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 予言の子
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - The Child of Prophecy
L`enfant de la prophétie
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Yogen no Ko
episode.summary: Jiraiya weakens the seal on the Nine Tails in order to help Naruto learn how to control the Tailed Beast`s power. Jiraiya recalls the words spoken to him years ago by the Great Lord Elder. He told Jiraiya that he would have a student, and that his guidance would decide whether the student would save the Ninja World or destroy it. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 籠の鳥
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - The Caged Bird
L`oiseau en cage
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Kago no Tori
episode.summary: Naruto joins up with the rest of his comrades, and together they overcome the puppet attack. The masked man witnesses this and is convinced there is a future for the young shinobi. He promises to release the kidnapped jonin and begins to explain the truth, and the situation behind his motives. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 里抜け
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - Leaving the Village
Désertion
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Sato Nuke
episode.summary: Sasuke leaves the village in order to obtain power from Orochimaru. Naruto and his friends learn that Sasuke is in danger and decide to go after him. To keep this a secret, only Naruto and Shikamaru set out on this mission, but on the way the duo are accosted by masked ANBU shinobi! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 力の差
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - The Difference in Power
Abîme
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Chikara no Sa
episode.summary: Three years have passed since Sasuke joined the Leaf Police Force, and he`s now lieutenant. But his abusive Police Force has only increased anxiety within the village, and the Uchiha remain in poor regard. Now that his training with Jiraiya has ended, Naruto returns to Hidden Leaf Village and has an explosive encounter with Sasuke in the middle of town! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 互いの道
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - The Mutual Path
Voies séparées
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Tagai no Michi
episode.summary: Sasuke takes his frustrations out on Naruto and the two begin to fight, this time with their respective new jutsu. Minato steps in just before it turns into a disaster. From this encounter, Sasuke realizes that he is nowhere equal to Naruto in strength and joins the Leaf Police Force, determined to beat him one day. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 帰還
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - Returning Home
Le retour
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Kikan
episode.summary: Naruto’s strength is recognized by his fellow genin, except Sasuke. But while Naruto enjoys a close relationship with his father, Sasuke’s father, Fugaku, constantly compares Sasuke with his older brother Itachi and barely pays attention to him… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 追手
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - Pursuers
La poursuite
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Otte
episode.summary: The Anbu who attack Naruto and Shikamaru are agents sent by Danzo, who had promised Orochimaru that he would deliver Sasuke safely to him. Luckily, Neji, Lee and Tenten rush to their aid in the nick of time! Meanwhile, Hiruko reveals the truth behind the incident involving Hizashi Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 衝突
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - Collision
Le choc
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Shoutotsu
episode.summary: Naruto reaches the tower Sasuke was heading for, thanks to Neji, Lee and Tenten deterring the agents from the Foundation. But it`s too late—Sasuke`s already made contact with Orochimaru! Naruto passionately tries to reason with Sasuke, but ultimately their powers collide! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ もう一つの月
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - Another Moon
Seconde lune
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Mouhitotsu no Tsuki
episode.summary: Sasuke has left with Orochimaru, but Naruto is not about to give up. Determined to bring Sasuke back, he returns to the village with Shikamaru and the others. Meanwhile, Yahiko appears in the village, calling himself “Pain" and seeking revenge for the Hidden Leaf’s betrayal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 仲間
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - Comrade
Compagnons
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Nakama
episode.summary: Seeing Hinata almost die triggers Naruto’s anger and he goes into Nine Tails State. Naruto`s power is enormous, but Pain releases his jutsu to seal him away. Hatred consumes Naruto as he tries to break the seal. With Naruto unable to calmly control the Nine Tails’ power, the village steadily heads toward destruction. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 忍達の共演
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - The Shinobi Unite
Épopée Shinobi
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Shinobi-tachi no Kyouen
episode.summary: Several months after Pain’s attack, Jiraiya arrives with intel regarding the Akatsuki, who are attacking shinobi villages and kidnapping their Kage and jonin. He also reveals that Sasuke is working with them. Naruto is determined to bring his friend and comrade Sasuke back, once and for all! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也忍法帳~ナルト豪傑物語~ 好敵手[ライバル]
Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls: The Tale of Naruto the Hero - Rival
Digne rival
Jiraiya Ninpouchou: Naruto Gouketsu Monogatari - Rival
episode.summary: Naruto wants to bring Sasuke back to the village, but Sasuke burns with a desire to bring Naruto down. Why is Sasuke so confrontational, and how did his feelings toward Naruto develop? The truth rises to the surface during Sasuke’s relentless attack. Where will this battle lead? Find out in the conclusion of the “Jiraiya Ninja Scrolls.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イタチ真伝篇~光と闇~ 生まれる命, 死ぬ命
Itachi`s Story: Light and Darkness - Birth and Death
Vie et mort
Itachi Shinden Hen: Hikari to Yami - Umareru Inochi, Shinu Inochi
episode.summary: The shinobi under Madara’s Infinite Tsukuyomi continue to slumber and have pleasant dreams. Meanwhile, Naruto and the others have escaped the genjutsu, thanks to Sasuke’s protective Susano’o. As Sasuke starts remembering the death of Itachi, his Sharingan starts to resonate and show him the truth that Itachi never spoke a word of. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イタチ真伝篇~光と闇~ 異才
Itachi`s Story: Light and Darkness - The Genius
Le prodige
Itachi Shinden Hen: Hikari to Yami - Isai
episode.summary: Having experienced the Great Ninja War as a young child, Itachi constantly questions the meaning the life and death, distancing him from other children his age. Soon after entering the Academy, Itachi exhibits his genius and finds himself at the top of his class. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イタチ真伝篇~光と闇~ 命の痛み
Itachi`s Story: Light and Darkness - The Pain of Living
Vie et souffrances
Itachi Shinden Hen: Hikari to Yami - Inochi no Itami
episode.summary: Upon graduating from the Academy, Itachi becomes a genin and joins a team that includes Tenma, Shinko, and their Jonin Leader, Minazuki Sensei. They accept a mission from Granny Cat to look for a missing feline who`s a skilled Ninja Cat! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イタチ真伝篇~光と闇~ シスイの依頼
Itachi`s Story: Light and Darkness - Shisui`s Request
La requête de Shisui
Itachi Shinden Hen: Hikari to Yami - Shisui no Irai
episode.summary: Itachi accompanies his friend Shisui on a three-part training exercise. The two come across a battle between the Hokage’s ANBU and the Foundation. Itachi is confused by their motives and can`t discern which side is right or wrong. But Shisui is unwavering in his determination to stop the fighting. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イタチ真伝篇~光と闇~ 月夜
Itachi`s Story: Light and Darkness - Moonlit Night
Pleine lune
Itachi Shinden Hen: Hikari to Yami - Tsukiyo
episode.summary: Itachi joins the ANBU and is quickly promoted to captain. But he must report directly to Danzo, and is placed as a double agent to observe the Uchiha clan, who are in the midst of planning a coup d’état. With dissatisfaction rising within the clan, the Uchiha ultimately decide to carry out their revolt, and the fateful night approaches. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イタチ真伝篇~光と闇~ 暁の闇
Itachi`s Story: Light and Darkness - The Darkness of the Akatsuki
Dans les ténèbres d`Akatsuki
Itachi Shinden Hen: Hikari to Yami - Akatsuki no Yami
episode.summary: Itachi becomes a rogue ninja and joins the Akatsuki. He is welcomed and introduced by Pain and Orochimaru as the ex-Leaf ANBU and the man who massacred his entire clan. Itachi is paired up with a man named Juzo, and their first job together is to fulfill an assassination request in the Land of Water. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イタチ真伝篇~光と闇~ 相棒
Itachi`s Story: Light and Darkness - Partner
Compère
Itachi Shinden Hen: Hikari to Yami - Aibou
episode.summary: Itachi is partnered with Kisame and begins his missions as a member of the Akatsuki. The duo succeeds in recruiting Deidara, so Pain assigns the newly formed team of Deidara and Sasori to hunt down the deserter Orochimaru. Meanwhile, intel comes in about an immortal killer, so Itachi, Konan and Kakuzu head out to the Land of Steam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イタチ真伝篇~光と闇~ 真
Itachi`s Story: Light and Darkness - Truth
Vérité
Itachi Shinden Hen: Hikari to Yami - Makoto
episode.summary: Itachi confronts Sasuke, who for years bore the shame and anger that Itachi brought upon their clan. The truth behind Itachi’s story comes to light. Back on the battlefield of the Fourth Great Ninja War, Naruto and the others fight Madara, and just as he is declaring his victory, something unexpected occurs... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: はじまりのもの
She of the Beginning
Au commencement
Hajimari no Mono
episode.summary: Kaguya Otsutsuki suddenly emerges from Madara’s body. She is the mother of Hagoromo, the Sage of the Six Paths who entrusted his powers to Naruto and Sasuke. Kaguya’s power is immense and instantly sends Naruto and Sasuke to an alternate dimension. Naruto and Sasuke are the only ones who can seal away Kaguya, but they can’t find a jutsu that works against her! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大筒木カグヤ
Kaguya Otsutsuki
Kaguya Ôtsutsuki
Ootsutsuki Kaguya
episode.summary: Kaguya Otsutsuki suddenly descends from the heavens as the people of the Land of Sou look on in surprise and suspicion. But their king, Tenji, is enthralled by her and takes her for his concubine. In this age of endless war, Kaguya wishes for nothing but peace. But as the self-proclaimed protector of the Divine Tree, she soon finds herself engulfed by the tides of chaos and war. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハゴロモとハムラ
Hagoromo and Hamura
Hagoromo et Hamura
Hagoromo to Hamura
episode.summary: Near the Divine Tree is an area known as the Peak of Demise. No one is allowed to go near it, except those chosen by Kaguya to undergo a ritual she has established. Gamamaru, a Sage Toad, says the truth lies beyond the peak—those words stir Hagoromo’s curiosity, and he decides to head out to investigate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 造られた過去
A Fabricated Past
Passé falsifié
Tsukurareta Kako
episode.summary: Kaguya is furious that Hagoromo has broken the law. Hagoromo finds out what Kaguya did in the past and makes up his mind to fight her. Knowing nothing about her, Hagoromo cannot trust her—he wonders if the love and the despair she experienced are the sole cause of her anger. Unable to reach an understanding, mother and sons begin their long, sad battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 意外性ナンバーワン!
The No. 1 Most Unpredictable Ninja
L`imprévisible
Igaisei Number One!
episode.summary: Black Zetsu reveals that he masterminded and influenced all the events from the end of Ashura and Indra`s era to the current Fourth Great Ninja War. Naruto rejects Black Zetsu’s claim that the entire history of shinobi was solely for the resurrection of his mother, Kaguya. Naruto and Sasuke work together to seal away Kaguya, but they can`t find a way to counter her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アシュラの決意
Ashura`s Decision
La résolution d`Asura
Ashura no Ketsui
episode.summary: Ashura sets out on a journey, intending never to return. He ends up in a village where the people suffer from a mysterious illness. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 試練の旅
The Tumultuous Journey
La quête
Shiren no Tabi
episode.summary: Hagoromo sends the brothers to two battle-scarred regions left untouched since the fight with Ten Tails. He then announces that he will choose his successor depending on the outcome of their missions. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アシュラとインドラ
Ashura and Indra
Indra et Asura
Ashura to Indra
episode.summary: Hagoromo`s two sons, Ashura and Indra, share a happy childhood, training and playing together. Indra is naturally gifted with great talent, and at a tender age is nicknamed the “genius of Ninshu.” On the other hand, Ashura has no aptitude for Ninshu. Still, the two boys are very close. But Hagoromo is unaware of the malevolent power stirring in the shadows… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍宗[にんしゅう]
Ninshu: The Ninja Creed
Ninshû
Ninshuu
episode.summary: The Infinite Tsukuyomi does not affect Hashirama, Tobirama, Hiruzen and Minato because they are reanimated. Hagoromo, the Sage of the Six Paths, appears and explains to the four that Hashirama and Madara are the reincarnations of his sons Ashura and Indra. Hagoromo recounts the tale of how he founded Ninshu, the Ninja Creed, and about the lives of Ashura and Indra. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二人をちゃんと
The Two of Them... Always
Les prendre en main
Futari o Chanto
episode.summary: Fearing that he will once again break a promise, Obito uses the last of his power to bring Sasuke and Sakura back, but the thought of his inability to protect Rin nags at him as he loses consciousness. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 繋がる想い
Connecting Thoughts
Sentiments liés
Tsunagaru Omoi
episode.summary: Before Naruto and Sasuke can attempt to seal Kaguya away, she transports Sasuke into a different Time-Space. Obito realizes that Kaguya’s ability to travel through Time-Space is similar to Kakashi’s and his own Visual Prowess. Obito and Sakura team up and begin the search for Sasuke. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特別任務
A Special Mission
Mission spéciale
Tokubetsu Ninmu
episode.summary: Finally, the truth will be revealed... Do not miss the unveiling of the legend. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 後継者
The Successor
Successeur
Koukeisha
episode.summary: Everyone believes that Indra is the best choice to be Hagomoro`s successor, and the sage`s indecision begins to cause anxiety among his followers. Finally, Ashura returns home, and Hagoromo reveals who he has chosen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 終末の谷
The Final Valley
La vallée de la fin
Shuumatsu no Tani
episode.summary: The battle with Kaguya is over, and all that is left is for Naruto and Sasuke to combine their powers and release the Infinite Tsukuyomi. But before they can do this, Sasuke makes a shocking declaration. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おめでとう
Congratulations
Félicitations
Omedetou
episode.summary: Team 7 joins forces and succeeds in sealing away Kaguya, and the Tailed Beasts that Kaguya absorbed are also freed. Black Zetsu escapes the seal to lie in wait for another time to resurrect his mother, but Naruto is not about to let him go! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 写輪眼, 再び
The Sharingan Revived
Les Sharingans, encore une fois
Sharingan, Futatabi
episode.summary: Chakra—whose energy connects this world to those beyond—allows Obito to leave Rin`s side for a moment and appear in Kakashi’s inner psyche. Obito gives him his Magekyo Sharingan and leaves with a parting wish that Kakashi become the Sixth Hokage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お前は必ず
You Better...
Quoi qu’il advienne !
Omae wa Kanarazu
episode.summary: Recalling the time when he shared Naruto’s desire to become Hokage, Obito opens up to Naruto about his dreams. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うずまきナルト!!
Naruto Uzumaki
Naruto Uzumaki
Uzumaki Naruto!!
episode.summary: "I`ll be a better shinobi than Lord Hokage! Then all the villagers will have to acknowledge my existence at last!" True to his word, Naruto has walked his own path until there are none who do not recognize that he`s become a great shinobi and a hero who has saved the world. But what path will Naruto take now? How will the world of the shinobi change? This is the story of the boy who blew through the hearts of all like a "shippu," an irresistible gale. This is the story of Naruto Uzumaki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 和解の印
The Unison Sign
Réconciliation
Wakai no Shirushi
episode.summary: Naruto and Sasuke are enveloped in a huge, intense light after exchanging attacks. When they come to, scenes from their childhood unfold. Is this just a figment of their imagination? Or could this be the afterlife? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナルトとサスケ
Naruto and Sasuke
Naruto et Sasuke
Naruto to Sasuke
episode.summary: Naruto and Sasuke have both become such high-level shinobi that each knows exactly what the other is thinking just by exchanging attacks. Despite knowing how Naruto feels, Sasuke is determined to cut him down. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の闘い
The Final Battle
Le dernier combat
Saigo no Tatakai
episode.summary: Naruto and Sasuke have both become such high-level shinobi that each knows exactly what the other is thinking just by exchanging attacks. Despite knowing how Naruto feels, Sasuke is determined to cut him down. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自来也 / KAKASHI
Jiraiya / Kakashi
Jiraya et Kakashi
Jiraiya / Kakashi
episode.summary: Ever since he was young, Jiraiya has been a little pervy. He tries to involve Orochimaru in many of his exploits as well as his schemes to get Tsunade’s attention. In Kakashi`s story, we see him living on his own since his father, Sakumo, died. Rin and Obito are fascinated by Kakashi, but his aloofness makes him hard to figure out. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 我愛羅 / SHIKAMARU
Gaara / Shikamaru
Gaara et Shikamaru
Gaara / Shikamaru
episode.summary: "Gaara spends his days with Yashamaru, his surrogate parent. Meanwhile, a bored Shikamaru pulls a prank on Choji" Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: SASUKE / SAKURA
Sasuke / Sakura
Sasuke et Sakura
Sasuke / Sakura
episode.summary: As a child, Sasuke craved attention from his older brother Itachi. Sasuke and Itachi have a chance to spend some time alone when their parents are away. Meanwhile, Sakura is very shy and tends to spend her free time by herself. One day, her new friend Ino gives her a present. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: NARUTO / HINATA
Naruto / Hinata
Naruto et Hinata
Naruto / Hinata
episode.summary: As a result of having the Nine Tails sealed inside of him, Naruto is feared and hated by the villagers. He trains all alone in the woods, but one day, a certain man appears and strikes up a conversation with Naruto. Elsewhere, in the Leaf Village, a celebration is held to mark Hinata`s third birthday, where she meets Neji for the first time. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サスケ真伝 来光篇 起爆人間
Sasuke`s Story: Sunrise, Part 1 - The Exploding Human
Les bombes humaines
Sasuke Shinden: Raikou Hen - Kibaku Ningen
episode.summary: "The fourth Great Shinobi World War has ended. But Sasuke decides to continue his solitary journey—this time to atone for his sins. Meanwhile, back at the Leaf Village, there is a growing number of missing shinobi. As Kakashi—the sixth Hokage—and the others discuss these incidents, the Leaf is attacked by a mysterious group of shinobi." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サスケ真伝 来光篇 最後の一人
Sasuke`s Story: Sunrise, Part 5 - The Last One
Le dernier survivant
Sasuke Shinden: Raikou Hen - Saigo no Hitori
episode.summary: Sasuke begins his own investigation into the incidents. He overcomes many dangers on his path to the truth. The Exploding Humans, the Ketsuryugan, the Chinoike Clan, and the Uchiha Clan—just how are they connected? Where does his journey lead? The mystery is about to be solved... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サスケ真伝 来光篇 血龍眼
Sasuke`s Story: Sunrise, Part 4 - The Ketsuryugan
Ketsuryûgan
Sasuke Shinden: Raikou Hen - Ketsuryugan
episode.summary: Sasuke uncovers Fuushin’s true identity at last, and begins to fight him. The moment Sasuke tries to read Fuushin’s memories with his Sharingan, a wave of genjutsu from a massive red eye causes Sasuke to lose consciousness. He awakens to find himself alone, and sees tracks in the snow that indicate Fuushin has barely escaped alive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サスケ真伝 来光篇 風心
Sasuke`s Story: Sunrise, Part 3 - Fuushin
Fûshin
Sasuke Shinden: Raikou Hen - Fuujin
episode.summary: Orochimaru brings Sasuke to the Coliseum fighting ring, to lure out En Oyashiro, who may have some information regarding the Exploding Human incident. The match is called off when more Exploding Humans appear and the opportunity to meet Oyashiro seems lost. However, impressed by Sasuke’s Sharingan, Oyashiro approaches him in person. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サスケ真伝 来光篇 闘技場[コロシアム]
Sasuke`s Story: Sunrise, Part 2 - Coliseum
Coliseum
Sasuke Shinden: Raikou Hen - Colosseum
episode.summary: Instead of returning to the Hidden Leaf, Sasuke sets out with Chino and Nowaki to investigate the cause of the exploding humans. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シカマル秘伝 闇の黙に浮ぶ雲 暗雲
Shikamaru`s Story: A Cloud Drifting in the Silent Dark, Part 2 - Dark Clouds
Nuages sombres
Shikamaru Hiden: Yami no Shijima ni Ukabu Kumo - An`un
episode.summary: After the Great War, many missing and Rogue Ninja made their way into the Land of Silence. Sai, who has infiltrated the region to investigate, sends a cryptic message back to the Leaf. Shikamaru, determined to find out what`s happening, heads for the Land of Silence with two members of the ANBU, Soku and Ro. However, they must first get past a heavily guarded checkpoint. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シカマル秘伝 闇の黙に浮ぶ雲 風雲
Shikamaru`s Story: A Cloud Drifting in the Silent Dark, Part 1 - The State of Affairs
Nuages à l`horizon
Shikamaru Hiden: Yami no Shijima ni Ukabu Kumo - Fuuun
episode.summary: It’s been two years since the end of the Fourth Great Ninja War. Shikamaru now has an important role within the Hidden Leaf government, and as a representative of the Leaf in the Alliance. One day, a situation develops with shinobi disappearing in droves, and Shikamaru takes on a dangerous mission. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木ノ葉秘伝 祝言日和 ナルトの結婚
Hidden Leaf Story: The Perfect Day for a Wedding, Part 1 - Naruto`s Wedding
Naruto se marie
Konoha Hiden: Shuugenbiyori - Naruto no Kekkon
episode.summary: Naruto and Hinata’s wedding day has been set. As the date approaches, Kakashi encounters a problem: Naruto’s friends are all top shinobi—the first line of defense in the village. They work 24/7, and there are always a few who cannot attend celebrations. As Kakashi tries to find the most reasonable solution, he announces a super-secret mission to find the couple a wedding gift. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シカマル秘伝 闇の黙に浮かぶ雲 東雲
Shikamaru`s Story: A Cloud Drifting in the Silent Dark, Part 5 - Dawn
L`aurore
Shikamaru Hiden: Yami no Shijima ni Ukabu Kumo - Shinonome
episode.summary: Ino, Choji, and Temari rush to Shikamaru’s aid! Choji takes on Ro, Temari goes after Soku, and Ino goes after Sai! Meanwhile, Shikamaru pursues Gengo. Can Shikamaru defeat Gengo’s evil ambitions? The final battle begins! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シカマル秘伝 闇の黙に浮かぶ雲 疑雲
Shikamaru`s Story: A Cloud Drifting in the Silent Dark, Part 4 - Cloud of Suspicion
Suspicion
Shikamaru Hiden: Yami no Shijima ni Ukabu Kumo - Giun
episode.summary: Shikamaru is captured while trying to save Sai and stop Gengo. Far from giving up, he racks his brain to find a away out of the situation. Just as an opportunity presents itself, Ro and Soku appear under Gengo’s control! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: シカマル秘伝 闇の黙に浮かぶ雲 闇雲
Shikamaru`s Story: A Cloud Drifting in the Silent Dark, Part 3 - Recklessness
Ciel ténébreux
Shikamaru Hiden: Yami no Shijima ni Ukabu Kumo - Yamikumo
episode.summary: Shikamaru and his team are within range of Fushu Castle, where Gengo is purported to be. But they are unable to glean any intel about the man. Learning that Gengo will make a public appearance, Shikamaru and company infiltrate the square, where they see Sai being held captive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木ノ葉秘伝 祝言日和 最後の任務
Hidden Leaf Story: The Perfect Day for a Wedding, Part 5 - The Last Mission
La dernière mission
Konoha Hiden: Shuugenbiyori - Saigo no Ninmu
episode.summary: Shino and Kiba still don`t have a wedding gift for Hinata`s wedding. Kiba`s made it his goal to become the next Hokage, but unlike his teammates, who are steadfastly chasing their dreams, Shino is unsure about his. With this uncertainty, he sets out with Kiba and Akamaru on their final mission as Team 8! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木ノ葉秘伝 祝言日和 風影の御祝
Hidden Leaf Story: The Perfect Day for a Wedding, Part 4 - The Kazekage`s Wedding Gift
Le cadeau du Kazekage
Konoha Hiden: Shuugenbiyori - Kazekage no Oiwai
episode.summary: The Tsuchikage and Raikage, who are in the Leaf Village to attend the Five Kage Summit, mention that they have already prepared wedding gifts for Naruto. Gaara finds himself in a dilemma. He`s advised that the gift should be something that befits the Kazekage. He also learns that the Raikage is planning to perform a dance. Kankuro chimes in and suggests Gaara should dance as well—further plunging Gaara into indecision. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木ノ葉秘伝 祝言日和 湯けむりと兵糧丸
Hidden Leaf Story: The Perfect Day for a Wedding, Part 3 - Steam and Food Pills
Vapeurs enivrantes
Konoha Hiden: Shuugenbiyori - Yukemuri to Hyourou Maru
episode.summary: The super-secret mission to find Naruto and Hinata a wedding gift proves to be difficult for Shikamaru. Choji has found the perfect gift, which adds to Shikamaru`s panic. But then Choji mentions something in passing and Shikamaru gets an idea. All he needs now is to enlist Temari`s help! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木ノ葉秘伝 祝言日和 フルパワー結婚祝い
Hidden Leaf Story: The Perfect Day for a Wedding, Part 2 - A Full-Powered Wedding Gift
La furieuse quête du cadeau de mariage
Konoha Hiden: Shuugenbiyori - Full Power Kekkon`iwai
episode.summary: Naruto and Hinata’s wedding day has been set. As the date approaches, Kakashi encounters a problem: Naruto’s friends are all top shinobi—the first line of defense in the village. They work 24/7, and there are always a few who cannot attend celebrations. As Kakashi tries to find the most reasonable solution, he announces a super-secret mission to find the couple a wedding gift. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木ノ葉秘伝 祝言日和 祝いの言葉
Hidden Leaf Story: The Perfect Day for a Wedding, Part 7 - The Message
Vœux de noces
Konoha Hiden: Shuugenbiyori - Iwai no Kotoba
episode.summary: Naruto had once lived a lonely existence, ostracized by everyone. But Iruka`s words and his very presence have supported Naruto to this day. As Naruto`s wedding nears, Iruka begins to lose sight of what he was to Naruto, and is unsure of what to say for his message. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木ノ葉秘伝 祝言日和 極秘任務の行方
Hidden Leaf Story: The Perfect Day for a Wedding, Part 6 - The Outcome of the Secret Mission
Turpitudes
Konoha Hiden: Shuugenbiyori - Gokuhi Ninmu no Yukue
episode.summary: Naruto had once lived a lonely existence, ostracized by everyone. But Iruka`s words and his very presence have supported Naruto to this day. As Naruto`s wedding nears, Iruka begins to lose sight of what he was to Naruto, and is unsure of what to say for his message. Source: crunchyroll
